Tap into Vanish, the original new game from The Mascoteers, the team behind some of the most popular apps in 2016 including Circlify and 360 Degree!

Quick timing and instincts are the name of the game, as your job is to defend the ocean from fast-moving white balls falling from the sky and coming at you from all angles. You need quick wits and quicker reflexes in this tapping bonanza as you defend your space and last as long as you can to get a high score.

Tap on each of the falling balls to shoot out black defensive orbs. If you make a hit, you will zap the ball to oblivion, but if you miss, you’ve got another falling object to deal with as the pull of gravity will bring the ball back at you just as fast!

The aim of the game is to avoid having any ball or orb hit the water and rack up points with every white ball you manage to ‘vanish’. You can also collect stars along the way to boost your point total!

Vanish makes for a great way to pass time without having to do too much thinking - perfect for when you’re traveling on public transport or chilling at home!

Give The Mascoteers’ hottest new app Vanish a try today for free!

The top of 5 colors mean your purpose which you have to vanish panels. The colors doesn't need to be tapped. 
You have to tap center of panels as same as the left of top of 5 colors. If you correct to tap, then the panel will be vanished and the top of 5 colors will be changed to move 1 left. 
When you vanish all of panels, the game will be done. 

The records can be saved 10 ranks.

This VR game is visualizing three movements of my musical work “Journey into the World of Dimensions -for solo Saxophone, Piano, and electronic music,” which is about a traveler walking through a series of imaginary multi-dimensional worlds. Although a world with more than three dimensions is beyond many people's imagination, I draw upon research from Seth Materials suggesting that while dreaming, people are not limited by their neural system as much as when they are awake, and therefore can sense information from other dimensions. Unfortunately, the human brain does not always accurately translate images and sounds; this is why, when we recall our dreams, the narrative, imagery, and the like are foggy. Therefore, this work is more like a surrealistic (or dream-like) work. 

With this VR game, a musical artwork would be more accessible to audience. And a VR game will be not only entertaining, but also more art-oriented and educational. Hope you enjoy it!

-Immersive ambient soundtrack (best for headphone)
-Designed for Google Cardboard virtual reality headset (second generation Google VR), or any VR headset with button for touching the screen.
-Stay tuned for more scenes in the future.

For more information about this work and composer, please visit my website: www.zoelin.me

column5: The best VATSIM map on iOS
column6:
The most visually appealing and feature-rich VATSIM traffic map has arrived for iPhone and is packed full with cool features!


View all online traffic in the VATSIM world with options to show detailed airport information for every airport in the AIRAC and of course, detailed routes* using Navigraph navigation data.


See controllers online all around the world using precise polygons drawn for each ATC centre controller and radar icons at the exact location of any local controller.


There has never been such an advanced map available for VATSIM users with such a great level of detail and VatTraffic is the first to offer this amazing combination of features in the palm of every user's hands.


Preparing for takeoff or descent? Check the weather at your airport of choice using the built-in METAR view* and get easy access to wind, altimeter, visibility, and temperature as well as runway information within seconds!


* Route options, METAR view, ATC information, and departures/arrivals are only available on iPhone 5 and newer. May require in-app purchase.


* SID/STAR viewer only available on iPhone 6 and newer. Requires in-app purchase.


      more

The same VatTraffic you know and love from iPhone has landed on iPad with VatTraffic Pro and is now optimized for big displays!

View all online traffic in the VATSIM world with options to show detailed airport information for every airport and detailed routes using Navigraph navigation data.

Use the built-in route viewer to have any plane's route drawn on the map and go through each waypoint/VOR/NDB of the route to see vital information like frequency or coordinates.

See controllers online all around the world with precise polygons drawn for each ATC centre controller and radar icons at the exact location of any local controller.

Preparing for takeoff or descent? Check the weather at your airport of choice or alternate using the built-in METAR view and get easy access to wind, altimeter information, visibility, and temperature information within seconds.

Use the built-in SID and STAR viewer to plan your route before you even leave the ground using the latest navigation data available from Navigraph!

Other great features include:live arrival/departure information for every airport; runway and ILS information for every airport; plane tracking; VOR/NAVAID viewer when zoomed in.

There has never been such an advanced map available for VATSIM users with such a great level of detail and VatTraffic Pro is the first to offer this amazing combination of features on any iOS device, all for a great low price!

Pole vaulting has never been so fun! Cascading cliffs, huge bouncy springs and those infuriating red balls! How far can you go? How long will you last? Can you get the highest score? Classic intuitive physics arcade action with easy to use, hard to master tap and hold controls, mean that things aren't as simple as they seem.Features:- Intuitive single touch pole vaulting gameplay.- Simple concept that anyone can grasp!- Collect coins to unlock unique characters- Full game centre support to compete with friends and foesImportant informationThis game contains third party advertising which can be removed via a one time IAP. Here in the VaultChain, life is tough as a tiny piece of glowing data.  

It's a binary existence composed of ones and zeros. But they move at light speed purposely through cyberspace.  They're proud of what they are.  And they REALLY value their privacy.

However their world is full of corrupt corporations, hackers, government agents, viruses and other villains that try to spy, copy, steal or completely destroy what they are.  The only safe haven? The super secure realm of the VaultChain.

Journey through challenging levels and find secret keys that unlock the VaultChain.  It super-secures everything entering, stored, and shared within it.  It safely distributes data across millions of identical, private, linked, repository vaults. And this means no one could ever harm them again!

Take the exciting journey into the VaultChain action game:

* 20 game levels that increasingly tests the skills
* Challenging obstacles to navigate in fun 3D game worlds
* Unlock secret VaultChain entrances by finding special keys

Download the free VaultChain game now!

VBelote is a social card game where you can play Bazar Belote, Head-to-Head Belote, French Classic and French Coinche Belote with friends for free, join tournaments, become part of the community, win various prizes and have endless fun! Belote is a 32-card trick game widely played in France, Armenia, Bulgaria, Croatia and other European countries. The main difference between its head to head and bazar variations is the presence or absence of trade before the first draw. Anyone can download VBelote and become a pro. Players are matched based on skill level with an equally-skilled opponent in this free to play game.FEATURES:FREE TO PLAY - It’s absolutely free to play the game!TOURNAMENTS - Join tournaments and win various prizes!DIFFERENT PLAYING MODES - Play Head-to Head or 2vs2!LOGIN VIA FACEBOOK - Connect via Facebook and play with friends. Receive more free Chips by watching sponsored videos and inviting your Facebook friends!LEVEL UP - Progress from amateur to expert with varied chip entries!DAILY BONUSES - Return to the game daily and enjoy bonuses!VBelote is the best place to have fun and earn exciting rewards for playing. If you play card games you’ll feel right at home in our VBelote community!If you have suggestions and questions feel free to contact us!E-mail : support@vbelote.comDon’t forget to leave a review to improve our VBelote game.

The VBS 2020 Concrete & Cranes iOS App is packed with music, Bible stories, games and more. This app is fun for the whole family. As kids explore a world of concrete and cranes, rivets and rebar, bulldozers and backhoes, they will learn to build their faith on Jesus as they uncover the truth that He who began a good work will be faithful to carry it on to completion.

VDTruck: Last Convoy, introduces you to the world of the economy and the management of transport companies.To be the best, is not enough just to play! Most important is the thinking of what you play.Set up your company, find the best offers and demands contracts, plan the routes to reach the minimal cost, and organizes partnerships with other transport companies.Hire the most experienced drivers and buy the best trucks and your company will become profitable.Populate your truck fleet with the newest trucks with a choice of an extremely wide range.Don't you like the original trucks? Make them unique ... increase the performance, efficiency, paint them to your favorite color and be the best!

From the creators of War Of The Zombie comes a new adventure which combines match 3 puzzle action with in-depth RPG gameplay!

Immerse yourself in a zombie apocalypse world as you take command of a small military base to recruit & develop survivors in an effort to combat the zombie outbreak.

Hone your strategies on the combat puzzle board by matching 3 or more similar tiles to call your heroes into action, and with bigger matches come some very special weapon tiles. So with a good deal of luck and some clever strategies you'll soon be clearing the undead filled regions with your powerful squad of heroes!

As you progress through the land winning ever more match 3 RPG puzzle missions, you are in full control of which stats to boost for your heroes, perhaps hand out a promotion here or there, or maybe you want to train some new recruits to join the fight against those zombies? And don't just rely on human survivors either! Your trusty familiar 'pet' class (perfect for stunning the zombie hordes) has more powerful recruits as you progress, from man's best friend to wolves, leopards, tigers and the all powerful bear!

Clearing the land of the zombie outbreak is tough without the right equipment, but there's a huge supply of head gear, body & leg armor, belts, backpacks and of course awesome weapons (each class has a particular selection of weapons specialized for their needs) to be collected by completing the RPG match 3 puzzles within the missions. Or perhaps, you simply want to scavenge the regions you've already cleared?

In this zombie puzzle RPG match 3 game you'll come across zombies of all shapes and sizes, even a host of different zombified animals! As the undead horde slowly make their way towards your heroic squad, decide wisely on your best match 3 combat puzzle board move as those pesky zombies have their own special abilities that can catch you out unexpectedly. But fear not, your squad have their own set of unique class skills, and if you've packed some powerful combat inventory you might just turn your squad of recruited survivors into a squad of mighty zombie slaying heroes!

Join the VDV Match 3 RPG zombie puzzle battle now in glorious toon-styled 3D action!

• Build & upgrade your base of operations!
• Scavenge & collect +200 essential combat items, gear & weapons!
• Recruit, train, level up & promote your survivors into heroes!
• Choose what stats your heroes develop and whether they gain promotion!
• Choose what gear & weapons your heroes use during missions!
• Choose which combat items to use as mission battles unfold!
• Strategize how combat unfolds by matching tiles on the puzzle board!
• Discover new regions, locations & zombies in 240 replayable missions!

Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/vdvmatch3rpg

Vector Pop is a very simple 2D pump-up-the-jam neon arcade game inspired by Fresh Prince & all things 90s design. Experience the colourful pop explosion as a triangle racing through a crazy neon world of 90s graphics while collecting Beats and trying to staying alive by dodging stuff.  The game is actually very simple, everything else is just a beautiful distraction It’s like a music video back when MTV still played music videos FEATURES: *Choose your own pictures to see them inside the game’s 90s theme!*Save screenshots from the game with your photos to share with friends or print as posters! *Get multiple game skins/themes!*Listen to your own music while indulging the pop graphics!*Cheesy 90’s Music Mixes included in game*Share scores and compete for the Leader board*Endless game play*Bank Beats for points TIP:*Show us your skills! Record your game play with your choice of music playing and share it with us online! We would love to see what songs you think are the best to play with Vector Pop! Use the Hashtags #90sRenegade and #vectorpop Remember, the game is best experienced listening to 90’s Dance Music.   Most of all thank you for playing! We’d love to hear your feedback and ideas to improve our first game! Vector Race is a racing game where you can play alone or with friends in online and local matches
 
Inspired by the old slot car games, Vector Race is a simple and straightforward game that can be played by everyone!
 
Easy to learn, hard to master. Vector Race is a self-explanatory game, you just have to touch the pad to accelerate your car and release it to brake. Watch out for corners, if you are too fast you will slide off the track
 
Connect with Facebook to fight against your friends for the highest ranking. Race against the ghosts of your friends' best times and find out who is the fastest
 
Invite your family and friends to play fun races of up to 4 players on the same device in local multiplayer matches
 
Don't be surprised if the track changes color. The track is always the color of the car that is winning the race. That is very cool!
 
In campaign mode race against the CPU to win gold in every race and unlock new cars
 
Did you win all the gold trophies? Great, the challenge now is to win every hard mode race to win a special car!
 
Download Vector Race for free, invite your friends and have fun!

column6: Travel through the stars and to the farthest reaches of space as the leader of the Vector Squad! Vector Squad is an arcade game that challenges your quick reactions and decision-making. As you cruise through space your job is to place the ships in your squad in the right positions in order to evade the many dangers the universe has to offer. As you progress, new areas of space are open to you, and many of its strange anomalies force you to adapt or perish in the attempt. As you collect precious minerals in your travels, you can invest them to research and build new ships with special abilities. You can then add these new ships to your squad and combine their abilities to achieve longer journeys!

This game supports iCade and Gamedock controllers. Also, play on an external screen using those controllers.

Vector Star Brawl pays tribute to vector games of old. Choose among a bunch of unique ships, each with their own special power and characteristics to fight versus a friend or the computer.

The game features realistic 2D physics with gravity that affects every object (even bullets). Multiple scenarios to fight in are available as well as a challenge mode with infinite levels to hone your skills, alone or with the help of a friend.

Log in to Game Center to compete for high scores and unlock the ten available achievements.

If you liked old space games like Asteroids, Space War or Space Duel, then this game is for you!

Features:

- Brawl Mode: Fight against your friends on the same device.
- Challenge Mode: Fight versus waves of Aliens, both alone or with a friend.
- Six different ships with different powers (teleport, laser, missile, shield, invisibility, auto-aiming gun) all which weight and handle different.
- Game Center Support: Leader Boards for Challenge Mode and 10 Achievements.
- Realistic Physics and Ship control.
- Deformable vector objects.
- A great electronic-surf soundtrack (check our site if you want to download it).


      more

Based on a mythical vector arcade machine of the late 1980s that was never released, Vector-Z is a space shooter with advanced vector graphics and particle systems designed to dazzle your senses… it's as if the 1980's arcades never went away and the games kept getting better.Vector-Z is a unique, retro-style arcade game with glowing multicolor vector-graphics, analog synthesized sounds, and a retro soundtrack with amazing spaced out tunes to zap extraterrestrial invaders to.Some of Vector-Z's aliens have shields you have to time your shots to break through. There’s also an asteroid bonus level where you can break up asteroids for points, and break up bigger asteroids for power-ups, including bonus shields, extra lives, score multiplier, and a faster fire rate. HINTS: • Vector-Z’s ship holds 2 missiles. One fires from each wing, so there’s a slight offset. There is also a brief reload time.• Aliens are worth more points when they are attacking you. Even more points when they are really close!• Go for the bonus points from accuracy: at 50% you get 100 pts per hit, 200 pts at 75%, 400 pts at 90%, and 800 bonus pts per hit with 100% accuracy! • Aim for the bigger asteroids to collect hexagonal power-upsVector-Z is compatible with iCade, and requires iOS 7.1 or later.

Vectorbots is a retro-styled tower defense game, reminiscent of the early-1980's colour vector graphics games you would find in arcades. It is fast paced, and requires both quick and strategic thinking for success.

Earth 2049 – a toxic hellhole ruled by robots! Only you, VectorMan, can save the last remaining humans from extermination by the evil dictator Warhead. Now available on mobile, play free and rediscover SEGA’s ground-breaking pre-rendered stunner!Brawl, blast, morph and bomb your way through 16 lethal levels of mechanized mayhem. Collect devastating power-ups and morph your body into killer weaponry to end the robots’ toxic reign!FEATURES- 16 toxic levels of run ‘n’ gun insanity! Combat waves of mechanized monsters in hellish future-world.- Transform VectorMan into a drill, a bomb, or a mechanized fish to bring the robot tyranny to an end!- The better you are, the more power-ups you’ll earn to give you the edge over a host of insane enemies.MOBILE GAME FEATURES- PLAY FREE with ad-support or ad-free via In-App Purchase- SAVE YOUR GAMES – save your progress at any point in the game- LEADERBOARDS – compete with the world for high scores- REWIND GAMEPLAY – go back in time to beat some of SEGA's hardest challenges- HAPTIC SUPPORT: get into the game with responsive button presses - CONTROLLER SUPPORT: MFi compatible controllersRETRO REVIEWS"Absolutely great. One of the best releases of the year.”[96%] - CVG (November 1995)"I guarantee your jaw will drop in amazement."[90%] - SEGA Pro (December 1995)VectorMan TRIVIA- The word ‘Orbot’ means a robot who’s body is entirely composed of orbs.- When someone completed the game, the game cartridge would light up with a special telephone number for people to dial to see if they were the first to complete it!- When originally released, the first person to complete the game won $25,000 and a role in a SEGA advert for their efforts!- Although VectorMan got a sequel, a third game was originally planned and would have seen our hero redesigned from top to toe!VectorMan HISTORY- The game was originally released in 1995- Developed by: SEGA- Designers: Rich Karpp & Mark Lorenzen- Composer: Jon Holland- - - - -Privacy Policy: http://www.sega.com/mprivacy/Terms of Use: http://www.sega.com/Mobile_EULAGame apps are ad-supported and no in-app purchases are required to progress; ad-free play option available with in-app purchase.This game may include "Interest Based Ads" (please see http://www.sega.com/mprivacy#2e_Third_Party_Info for more information)​ and may collect "Precise Location Data" ​(please see http://www.sega.com/mprivacy#2e_Third_Party_Info ​for more information)​© SEGA. column6: A CAPTIVATING ATMOSPHEREWelcome to the psychedelic world of Vectronom: experience waves of color and a pulsing geometric path that changes with the beat... All set to a hypnotic electronic soundtrack. There’s only one thing to do: turn up the volume and go with the flow. UNTZ! UNTZ! UNTZ!SOLVE PUZZLES AT THE SPEED OF SOUNDFind your path through an ever-changing world, keeping the rhythm with every move you make. Think it sounds easy? The highly intuitive and addictive gameplay will keep you moving through daunting challenges... But how long will you last when the challenges get trickier and trickier? Better play to find out!Co-produced and published by ARTE, Vectronom is the first video game from independent studio Ludopium. The prototype was developed in the Franco-German accelerator program Spielfabrique. The game has already won several awards, including “Best Game” at the Indie Arena Booth at Gamescom 2018 and GDC’s “Best in Play” 2019.FEATURES• A challenging single player campaign• Each level features original electronic soundtrack and a colorful, dynamic art style• Regular updates based on curated User Generated Content

Vega Connect4 is an AI powered Connect4 game that is built on the principles of reinforcement learning using Deep Neural Network. This app has three levels. To the battle stations! The enemy is at our doorstep and it’s time to launch the counterattack. Vega Defender gives you command over a fleet of spaceships that you need to deploy. You can create Destroyers, Fighters, Cruisers, Bombers and Submarines with each ship having a strategic advantage. The enemy will launch ships to strike at you so prepare your defences or gear up for an assault when the time is right. Your goal is to protect your space city as the enemy tries to chip away at your defences. Attack and destroy the enemy city before they destroy yours to claim victory! Play one-on-one using one device against another human player in Duel mode or test your skills against the AI defender in Campaign mode. Prepare for space combat!

Features:

- Play through 12 exciting missions in Campaign mode against the computer. The computer’s strategy in a mission may change with every attempt for added replay value. 
- Protect your space city and destroy the enemy’s city to claim victory.
- Challenge another person to a duel using your device in Duel Mode.
- Some missions give the player the ability to arrange predetermined ships into a formation to fight the opponent.
- Strategy can turn the tides of battle. Choose your ships carefully to counter the enemy’s forces.
- Fighters are quick to build and fast, but are weak. A Cruiser takes a long time to build, but it’s power and defences are formidable. 
- 1980’s arcade style graphics give the game a nostalgic and retro vibe.
- If you need a break, simply double tap during a mission to pause the game.
- Prepare to enter the fray and defend your city!

A new challenge awaits you!Test your Solitaire skills in Vegas Solitaire TriPeaks, a free card game now on IOS!Gain achievements and compete with your friends!Solitaire TriPeaks is a classic card game loved by many people, because it needs strategy and skill to win!Each TriPeaks game starts with eighteen cards dealt face-down on the tableau to form three pyramids with three overlapping tiers each. Over these three pyramids is one row of cards dealt face-up.HOW TO PLAYYour goal in Vegas Solitaire TriPeaks is to clear three pyramids. To remove a card from those pyramids, it must be a rank higher or lower then the top card on the pile, regardless of suit.If it matches, this card becomes the new top card and the process is repeated several times (e.g. 7-8-9-10-9-10-J-10-9-8, etc.) until the there are no more matching cards left.Meanwhile, any face-down cards in the pyramids that are no longer overlapped by other cards are turned up.After you cleared all three pyramids all your free stock pile cards get counted for bonus points and you advance to the next level of Vegas Solitaire TriPeaks.FEATURES▶ Classic card game, simple and relaxing▶ Challenge friends and players worldwide▶ Exciting & Challenging Solitaire game▶ Easy to play, yet hard to master▶ Play without Internet or Wifi▶ No special permissions needed▶ iOS GameCenter (Optional)▶ Its a free card game!Have fun!If you have any suggestions for Vegas Solitaire TriPeaks or if you encounter any problems with this game,please write me: dev@gregorhaag.comI would love to hear from you!

*** Do you dare to become the ultimate Veggie Fighter? ***ENDLESS GAMEPLAY WITH A VEGGIE TWIST.Veggie Fighters are known as the bravest warriors - those who dare to slice and dice tomatoes, cucumbers, broccoli and even the infamous cabbage! Do you think you have what it takes to play endlessly without letting your empire tumble to the floor and become soup? ***Features***- Chop and slice vegetables to beat your high score! - Three addictive game modes including Classic, Arcade and Time Mode. - Fun, addictive and challenging gameplay that the whole family will enjoy! FUN AND ADDICTIVE VEGGIE MADNESS FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY!Ancient legend tells us that Veggie Fighters come from every corner of the world - could you be one of them? Use your finger as the ultimate weapon in this fun, addictive and challenging game that the whole family will enjoy!3 AWESOME MODES FOR LIMITLESS HOURS OF FUN!With 3 fist-clenching game modes to beat, Veggie Fighter will never leave you bored for a single moment. Swipe and slide as veggies zoom onto the screen - can you chop and slice them all before gravity takes them as victims? BEWARE OF BOMBS AND KEEP ALL THREE LIVES!When you begin your career as a Veggie Fighter, you have three precious lives! Avoid bombs and don’t let a single veggie slip from your sight - because if you do, you will lose a life! Sounds simple, right? Take on the vegetables and chop them into pieces - in Veggie Fighter!***Think fast, choose best time and place, keep cutting & slicing***

Beat boredom with a blast of fun match-3 action!

Veggie Flip is a frantic, explosive puzzle game, where you blitz through levels trying to outdo yourself and your friends. Score as many points as possible in a one-minute mad dash for the high score by matching three or more to create gigantic combos of mayhem.

FUN NEW MECHANICS & SMOOTH GAMEPLAY
Jump around as a bunny rabbit, clearing the playing field and causing mayhem all around. Swipe to move. Sounds easy, right? Try it! It's surprisingly challenging to score high points! Build up to a FRENZY by making lots of matches quickly. In Frenzy mode you'll score big points with huge multipliers.

The game is also designed to load fast & play smoothly, just so you can squeeze in that one extra match before the bus arrives.

COMPETE ON THE LEADERBOARDS
Try to beat your friends' scores by being quicker and smarter than them. Whoosh up the rankings by improving your score bit by bit. Maybe you can reach the top?

EXCITING AND POWERFUL ABILITIES
Try to mix-and-match abilities to build the perfect combination for you. Unlock abilities, and upgrade them to make them even more useful. Whether it be using Shuffle to re-arrange the playing field, or using Bombs, Vertical Rockets and the likes to just blast your way through, you're bound to find a combo that matches your play style the best. Every update will add new abilities and upgrades to play with, so look forward to them!

Earn levels and upgrades by collecting experience points, coins and gems, each level making you more powerful than the previous. As you fly through the levels, you will also notice that you have become more skillful yourself!

COLLECT CUTE CHARACTERS
Find your favorite among the collection of ultra-cute characters (and not-so-cute ones, too, if you're so inclined!). Earn new playable characters by beating challenges in the game.

BEAT THE DEVELOPER HIGH SCORE
Lingon Games is a small indie studio, so YOU'RE a big part of making this game great! Please let us know at feedback@lingongames.com if you have any ideas on what you'd like to see in the game! Our current high score is 221,460. Good luck with that!

---

Privacy Policy: https://lingongames.com/privacy

Veggie Flip is free to download, but you will be able to purchase gems in the game with real money. You can turn off in-app purchases in your device's settings.

column1: Vehicle Flashcards for Kids, Babies or Toddlers
column6:
Download now to show your child almost 150 images and sounds of cars, planes, ships or agricultural machinery. Easy to use. Slideshow feature for the youngest. 5 different categories. Favorites category.

Show your child what vehicle makes what sound, what is the correct pronunciation and how to write its name.

Simplicity is the key to a successfull app for children. Touch the vehicle to see its magnified image and hear its sound, name and written form. Touch the arrow or swipe your finger to get to next or previous page with more vehicles. Run simple Slideshow for the youngest where no children cooperation is needed.

FEATURES
---------

* 5 categories:
--- Cartoon vehicles (36 cartoon images)
--- Ships and Boats (18 photo images)
--- Things that fly (18 photo images)
--- Cars, Motorcycles, Trucks etc. (36 photo images)
--- Construction Vehicles, Agricultural Machinery, Trains etc. (39 photo images)

* Custom: you can put your favorite images into special custom category

* Sounds of vehicles
--- You can turn off the sounds and listen just to verbal description

* Navigation
--- You can navigate between pages by swiping your finger, touching left/right arrow or both

* Verbal description
--- Hear name of vehicle in American English or Slovak.
--- You can turn off verbal description completely and listen just to sound of vehicle

* Text description
--- See name of vehicle under the image
--- You can also turn off the text description completely

* Simple slideshow feature for the youngest

* Different thumbnails count for page
--- You can configure to have 4 larger or 9 smaller images on every page.

* Automatic horizontal or vertical adjustment (i.e. works both in landscape and portrait orientation)

* HD photos/sounds

* Bright colorful images

* No internet connection required

* In-App Purchase
--- You get 9 images in every category for free. Rest is available after in-app purchase. 
--- Pay once and have full content on all your iPhones and iPads.

~ The most exciting vehicle interactive games in the App-Store ~
~~ A rewarding and educational experience for children of all ages ~~
~~~ 150+ coloring screens in 7 unique games ~~~

Welcome to the most exciting vehicle games application in the App-Store. Here you will find an animated, interactive learning experience with 7 adorable preschool games. Including 50 types of vehicles to play with. Vehicle fun will help your little one learn about the different types of vehicles from planes in the sky to boats in the sea. 

> Coloring Book - Finger paint or fill areas with color to complete the cool coloring pages of cars from various types.
> Sticker Book - Interact with the adorable vehicles on screen while you can finger paint with colors and fill areas with paint buckets. 
> Puzzle Fun - Enjoy 50 colorful, intuitive vehicle shaped puzzles. 
> Maze Challenge - Help the vehicles find their way across the puzzle and reach the exit sign.
> Road Trip - Join Bobby the car - on his road trip of adventurous fun!. Help him collect all the boxes and find out which vehicle is hiding behind them. 
> Mix and Match - The vehicles got all mixed up, help match the parts and put the colorful vehicles back together. This game helps children develop their memory and logic skills. 
> Magic Draw - Slide your finger on the drawing area to magically color the page then watch the drawing come to life.

A game set about vehicles including 4 games.

This entertaining and educational game for preschool kids helps develop motor skills, hand-eye coordination, imagination, and creativity. It aims to teach children shapes and image recognition.

4 Color : 
   Cool puzzle game. Use no more than four colors to color the regions of the map so that no two adjacent regions have the same color. Adjacent regions share a common boundary that is not a corner.

This game is based on the famous 4 colors mathematical problem. 

Memory: This is the classic game of cards where you have to find pairs of car-related images. it has over 40 stages, each of them harder than the last and will challenge even the adults ability to memorize positions at the later levels. Matching games are a great way to improve your kids short-term memory skills, develop their concentration, and cognitive skills!

Advanced Memory Game: The idea as in the previous game, just need to find 3 identical cards.

Jigsaw Puzzle: One of the many vehicles images gets cut up into small pieces and it’s up to you to put it back in the right order to complete the image. You can see a preview of the image if you don’t know what it is you’re trying to put together.

The game is optimized for phones and tablets.

With this learning exercise children will have hours of fun.

Welcome to “Vehicle Jigsaw”. This educational app is designed for children aged 2.5 and above. Here children can learn to piece together a well known picture of a vehicle. It is fun, and it helps them develop spatial cognition skills and visual perception skills.

STEP BY STEP is a professional EdTech studio that focuses on developing educational apps for children aged 1 to 5 years old. During these critical years, children enter a new learning stage every few months. Our apps support and strengthen the development of crucial skills for each learning stage. This way we guide your children, step by step, throughout this entire age range.

Our key values are perfection and simplicity. We believe that small details make a big difference, so we give great attention to every detail — both in content and design. Most importantly, we keep our apps simple — simple to understand and simple to use.

While playing our games, children will engage in simple activities, such as matching, pairing, ordering, grouping, and sorting. This allows them to practice essential skills, such as: categorization, conceptualization, generalization, abstraction, memory, language, math, visual perception, fine motor, accuracy, attention, and focus. They will learn about shapes, colors, animals, fruit, vegetables, clothing, tools, vehicles, furniture, professions, toys, etc., — all while playing.

The levels are generally arranged by difficulty. The first levels are usually quite simple — their main objective is to teach players critical thinking and problem solving. However, the exercises become increasingly challenging as the child advances within the game. 

Our applications avoid distractions such as popups, unnecessary animation, and noisy feedback. We keep our applications safe for children — no advertisements, no unsafe links to external content, no popups, etc.

Furthermore, our experience indicates that our apps can be very helpful for children with special-needs¹, and that they can function as useful tools in both speech-language therapy² and in occupational therapy³. In addition, our apps have been found useful for adults with disabilities or dementia⁴.

For this reason, we added two important features: the first one was designed for teachers, therapists, and speech pathologists, which allows them to track the progress of their students; the second feature makes our apps also accessible for users with disabilities, and on this matter we would like to thank the Technology Consulting Center at “Beit Issie Shapiro”⁵ for their professional guidance and consultation regarding accessibility.

________

¹ Special needs - Learning difficulties due to learning disabilities, communication disabilities, emotional or behavioural disorders, physical disabilities and/or developmental disabilities, which may be caused by Autism (Autistic Spectrum Disorders), Down Syndrome, Dyslexia, Tourette Syndrome, etc.

² Speech-language therapy - Treatment of communication disorders by speech-language pathologists (SLP).

³ Occupational therapy (OT) - Treatment meant to develop, recover, or maintain daily living and work skills for people with a physical, mental or developmental condition.

⁴ Dementia -  A condition caused by brain injury (BI), brain damage or brain diseases, such as Alzheimer’s, Lewy bodies (DLB), Vascular dementia, etc.

⁵ "Beit Issie Shapiro" is a leading non-profit organization that develops therapies for people with disabilities, and also acts as a ‘Special Consultant’ to the United Nations.

column6:
If you had to design a new social contract for society, not knowing the gender, intelligence, or social status, you'd be born into, then how would you do it? That's the thought experiment behind this game, known as The Veil of Ignorance, and made famous by the late political philosopher John Rawls.

You choose what type of world you are born into but get no say in your family's social status, your attractiveness, or even your gender. Will you design a world where the most capable are free to reap the full rewards of their natural gifts or will you make a world where everyone is equal? And once in that world, will you focus on dating or self-improvement.

Part dating sim, part Darwinian experiment, all addictive!! Download now!

"You never get a second chance to make first contact."

In the far-flung future, humans make their way out into the galaxy, with disastrous results.  Most of the few generation ships that survive do so by making contact with the already established Iildiran Empire.

Based on Kevin J. Anderson's prequel to the award-winning series "The Saga of the Seven Suns", Veiled Alliances meshes art, story and mobile technology to deliver a reimagining of one of Science Fiction's most ambitious works.

Future Appisodes will be made for sale available via this app, but this first one is free.

Vektor is designed to train cognitive functions and number sense in order to improve mathematical ability. It can be used by children without any prior knowledge of mathematics, but is also advanced enough for children with 1 or 2 years of schooling, or with specific mathematical disabilities or dyscalculia. It is recommended that a child completes at least 40 training sessions.

In Vektor, children will have a magician avatar. By solving problems, they break the spell of the evil wizard and transform the animals back to being friendly again.

Cognition Matters is a non-profit organization dedicated to making cutting edge cognitive neuroscience research available to children all over the world, through playful digital applications. While traditional education teaches facts, we give children tools that improve their problem solving capacity.

Nakrmit zvířátka na farmě nikdy nebylo zábavnější. Skvělá hra pro celou rodinu!

Zábavná, dynamická a veselá hra.

Vhodná pro děti od 2 let.

Zvířátka na farmě si ráda hrají. Aby měla energii, potřebují naplnit svá bříška. Pomůžete jim

dát to, na co mají chuť? Dobře se vám za vaši pomoc odmění!

Krmení je opravdu zábavné. Čekají na vás 3 úrovně, které se odemknou ziskem minimálního

počtu bodů. Hra se postupně zrychluje. Procvičte si svoji schopnost rychle reagovat a

překonejte svůj bodový zisk. Můžete si tak doma uspořádat i malou soutěž o nejrychlejšího

hráče.

Jak hrát:

Nakrmte zvířátka jídlem, které se u nich zobrazuje v bublině. Krmí se tak, že jídlo přetáhnete

z pásu až na zvířátko. Kliknutím seberte ze země odměnu, kterou vám zvířátko dá, abyste

získali body.

Když vám dá kráva nebo koza mléko, nakrmte jím kočku, pokud je právě na farmě. Získáte tak

zvoneček navíc!

Hra je krásně ilustrovaná a jednoduchost hry přímo láká si ji zahrát.

Neobsahuje reklamy.

“On Your Mark, Get Set, … GO!”  Improve your academic game with DimensionU’s Velocity!    

Velocity is a first person, real-time multiplayer racing game, designed to help reinforce and improve student learning on over 400 standards-based Math and Literacy Skills in grades 2 – 10.  The app is free, and requires a valid DimensionU user account. Just install the app and sign-in with your existing username and password. 

The game objective: be the first to cross the finish line by racing through the obstacles and solving problems along the way to earn points. 

Each player can customize their own skill practice while still competing with others who may be playing on different skills, levels or subject areas.

In-game instructional help is available by tapping the “?” for assistance.   Full review of all incorrectly answered questions is provided to students.

Classroom educators can use the Teachers by DimensionU app to set-up curriculum-customized Velocity game rooms for their classes that also allow for collaborative team games.

Hard. Retro. ...and SUPER HARD!  Can you last 10 seconds? Are your thumbs blessed with the the nimbleness of an elf rogue drinking their third pot of coffee? Tell you what. Get over 1,000 points and the entire internet will bow down before you claiming you are the ultimate gaming god of the universe. 
 
GAMEPLAY
Hurl down a wormhole in an 8-bit spaceship… that has a proven track record of exploding… in this retro arcade runner (technically speaking, a space-time continuum flyer). Your only goal is to survive as long as possible. The longer you last, the faster you go, and the higher your score climbs.
 
Simple, right? HA!
 
Your dark-matter dash through the prismatic geometry wormhole is comprised of breakneck turns that will shatter your spaceship—and hopes of a high score—when crashed into. Luckily for you, you have infinite lives (and, apparently, an amazing mechanic), so you can replay the game without hesitation or remorse for the rocket you just destroyed seven seconds earlier.

"Step aside, Flappy Bird clones; there’s a new highly addictive game on app store shelves." - Rolith's Mom
 
FEATURES
Amazing 8-bit graphics
Classic arcade soundtrack
Simple yet skillful tap button controls
Original gold coin collecting system (no one’s ever done that before, right?)
Colorful and vivid 3D geometry cubes that change color like WOAH
Infinite lives! You don’t even need to be a cat (wait, what?)
Unlock new rockets and spaceships featuring state of the art pixel art
Totally free! But we make you watch an ad every once in awhile, ‘cuz, you know, someone has to pay your spaceship mechanic bill…
 
This ridiculously hard twitch game was created as an overnight project by Rolith and the CRIT Team at Artix Entertainment. May you enjoy countless hours of frustrating potty toilet gaming time with VelocityAE!

"No, no... this is great! At least Rolith did not use his spare time to making another game about Ponies." - Artix, Founder/CEO.

The Victory Column is a monument in Berlin, Germany. Designed by Heinrich Strack, after 1864 to commemorate the Prussian victory in the Danish-Prussian War, by the time it was inaugurated on 2 September 1873, Prussia had also defeated Austria in the Austro-Prussian War (1866) and France in the Franco-Prussian War (1870–71), giving the statue a new purpose. Different from the original plans, these later victories in the so-called unification wars inspired the addition of the bronze sculpture of Victoria, 8.3 meters high and weighing 35 tons, designed by Friedrich Drake. Berliners have given the statue the nickname Goldelse, meaning something like "Golden Lizzy".

The Victory Column is a major tourist attraction in the city of Berlin.

The Brandenburg Gate is a former city gate, rebuilt in the late 18th century as a neoclassical triumphal arch, and now one of the most well-known landmarks of Germany.

It is located in the western part of the city center of Berlin, at the junction of Unter den Linden and Ebertstraße, immediately west of the Pariser Platz. One block to the north stands the Reichstag building. The gate is the monumental entry to Unter den Linden, the renowned boulevard of linden trees, which formerly led directly to the city palace of the Prussian monarchs.

GamePlay

Ride this traditional vehicle in streets to transport passengers as your real task. This is not a door to door auto rickshaw simulator but instead, needs your real skilled driving in busy streets & make sure you reach stop on time so that you do not disappoint your Tuk Tuk Velotaxi: cycle rickshaw simulator union by being late. So start bicycle riding with a carriage attached to take people across a city street. Do not observe deadly driving in traffic rush & do not harm people in other heavy vehicles as well… only because of your rash bike riding.

Vemolo Spelling for Year 3 is the third of 6 progressive spelling apps that teach children all the words they have to learn in primary school, and is designed to teach children how to spell the most common words necessary for their core education. Kids can reinforce what they've learnt at school by practicing on a weekly basis, either on their own or with help from a parent.

Vemolo Spelling apps consist of weekly word lists that kids can read, hear and write, and are structured following the school curriculum. There's an advanced mode for those who excel at spelling, and it's also a wonderful game for non-English speakers of all ages for learning English.

The Vemolo series uses visualisation, colour coding and repetition to take the pain out of learning, and allows the child to form strong associations in their mind on many different levels - however they learn best. For learning numbers and shapes, see the other apps in the Vemolo series.

Vendetta Online is a 3D space combat MMORPG for Windows, Mac, Linux and Android. This MMO permits thousands of players to interact as the pilots of spaceships in a vast universe. Users may build their characters in any direction they desire, becoming rich captains of industry, military heroes, or outlaws. A fast-paced, realtime "twitch" style combat model gives intense action, coupled with the backdrop of RPG gameplay in a massive online galaxy. Three major player factions form a delicate balance of power, with several NPC sub-factions creating situations of economic struggle, political intrigue and conflict. The completely persistent universe and detailed storyline add to the depth of immersion, resulting in a unique online experience.

All users and platforms play within the same galaxy, allowing seamless transition between Windows, Mac, Linux, and even many Android mobile phones and tablets. Multi-platform integrated voice chat lets all players talk in real-time, helping groups and guilds to coordinate on gameplay.

The game is patched and updated frequently, often with updates every week. The developer staff and userbase actively discuss the future of the game on the game forums. Some users even choose to become directly involved, joining the volunteer "Player Contribution Corps" and creating new missions to tell stories of their own.

Vendetta Online is roughly a 600 megabyte download, with a little under 600MB of space needed on disk. Once installed, simply create an account via the game website and start exploring the free trial (no strings attached, no credit card required).

--- LEGAL ---

Duration and price of each subscription is displayed inside Vendetta Online's storefront, updated at the time of purchase. 1, 3, 6, and 12 month subscription lengths are available for both Premium and Lite modes. Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Subscriptions and auto-renewal can be managed/turned off in your App Store Account Settings.

Terms of Use: https://www.vendetta-online.com/h/eula.html
Privacy Policy: https://www.vendetta-online.com/h/privacy.html


      more

A simple cause and effect activity that gives you a lot to talk about. Simply touch the screen or press a switch to advance the animated story step by step. With simple clear graphics, this inclusive activity has been designed to provide a great opportunity for discussion and the development of everyday day vocabulary associated with using a vending machine. 
Look at the pictures and tell the story in your own words. can you guess what is going to happen, the driver didn’t until it was too late!
Why not make a print out of each stage of the story to use as sequencing activity.
•	Switch access options included (using available Bluetooth switch interfaces)
•	Simple touch access 
•	Bright clear graphics with bold outlines
•	Good simple and appropriate sound effects
•	Develop language around a familiar everyday activity
•	Anticipate outcomes

Venge is an objective-based first-person shooter. Every match is an intense unique experience with the ability cards that you can get in the game.Venge.io is an online shooter where you will be playing against real players from all around the world in an arena. There are several weapons to choose from such as Scar, Shotgun, Tec-9 and even a Sniper rifle!You must find the green areas on the map and capture that area before your opponents do. By capturing the area you will receive special skill cards that you can use, by pressing the Buy ability button, to improve your equipment and make you stronger.If you are familiar with games like Valorant, Overwatch or Paladins, you'll love Venge.io!Some AbilitiesGrenade- Midnight curse : makes enemy blind with darkness- Sparky spells : makes enemy blind with sparks- Muscle shock : gives electric shocks to enemy and inactivates- Venom : slows enemyPassive- Reduce : reduced grenade activation time- Taunt : Gives player %20 protective shieldFeatures- Play with your friends- Emotes (dance animations)- Abilities with cards- Different hero classes- Different and unique maps- 4 different weapons- Clans and shops are coming soon!

The classics reinvented. Take on swarms of enemies in this turn based combat RPG. Defeat enemies to progress through increasingly more difficult rounds to fight for stop spot in the leaderboards and see how long you can survive. Kill monsters to rank among the most ruthless players in the world.

Choose your attacks carefully to weaken your opponents. Use mana wisely in combat to take enemies down efficiently. Upgrade your heroes to make them stronger or more resilient in battle. Take on the gauntlet until you prove to be the most ruthless and take the glory that is yours.

Vengeance is a single-player RPG in which you can immerse yourself in a story accompanied by beautiful music and atmosphere. Your journey will be rewarded with legendary and mythical items.

     What awaits you at Vengeance?
7 character subclasses with 4 skills for each:
- Paladin
- Assassin
- Support
- Mage
- Archer
- Druid
- Necromancer
Enhance & crafting items.
Mythic & legendary items.
Many monsters & locations with beautiful music.

In Venice Boats you will be tasked with successfully navigating the maze that is this famous city’s canal system. Pilot one of the many boats as you admire the view! Visit famous landmarks including Rialto Bridge, Murano Island & San Marco Square. With 50 missions of increasing complexity and difficulty, you will start out slow, but will have to learn the ropes of being a captain quickly.

Sailing boats, gondolas and yachts are not all that awaits you. The game also features speedboats and gondolas for increased variety. Each of them controls a bit differently and will require that you adjust what you’d learned accordingly. You will also have to mind the inertia that affects the way your vehicle moves.

10 DIFFERENT VEHICLES
From fast speedboats and motor yachts to sailing boats and gondolas, each in-game vehicle poises its own unique challenge. Learn to pilot them all!

WATER TRAFFIC
Venice is a busy city and its canals are never empty. You will have to watch out for other people cruising along the canals. Don't hit a gondola with your speedboat!

BEAUTIFUL CITY VIEWS
This famous city is a sight to behold and the game captures its unique feeling. There truly is no other place like it on Earth – just see for yourself!

REALISTIC GRAPHICS
Marvel at the bautiful views, witness lifelike reflections on water and admire all the different boats the game has to offer!

FREE TO PLAY
The Main Game Mode is 100% FREE to play, all the way through, no strings attached! Extra Game Modes which alter the rules slightly to make the game easier are available through optional In-App Purchases. Each mode has separate leaderboards to make for totally fair competition!

GAME FEATURES
▶ HUGE CAR COLLECTION: Feel truly free driving 10 Awesome Cars
▶ DYNAMIC TRAFFIC: Deal with Real Traffic AI
▶ PRO PARKING MISSIONS: Huge campaign to beat, earn in-game money for your progres
▶ 100% Free to Play Missions
▶ CONTROLS: Buttons, Wheel, Tilt & MFi Game Controller Support
▶ CAMERAS: Multiple cameras including First Person view for full immersion
▶ iCLOUD: Supports play between your devices & automatic progress backup with iCloud

Venn - The jigsaw puzzle that breaks all the rules! No more looking for notches that match... you get to focus on an interesting image and see how the circle puzzle pieces overlap. It's an entirely new puzzle system that you have to try!

We've reinvented the jigsaw in a way that makes the image jump off the page. You assemble the pieces by overlapping circles, just like in a Venn diagram.

You'll be puzzling for hours! Venn has a fully curated selection of puzzles to play, each one in 5 different difficulties!

Venn Dogs contains 40 high quality photos we've picked out ourselves, and we're sure you're going to love them! Venn is fun for the whole family, with best times tracked so you can try to beat your friends!

You'll find Venn is easy to learn and is a fun and rewarding game experience - with a great image as the payoff!

Venn is a game by Wiggles 3D, the makers of Quote Slide, Eye Know: Image FX Word Quiz and Lexigo Rush.

Koptus og Apa tar oppdraget!

Helikopterspill for de minste med spennende oppdrag i og rundt Vennebyen!
Det er du som styrer Koptus når Apa blir kalt ut for å slukke branner, finne bortkomne turgåere eller levere viktig post.

Spilleren styrer helikopteret rundt i snødekte fjell, i et grønt skogsområde og over selve Vennebyen.

Spillmekanikk og kontroller er intuitive og enkle, men det vil kreve litt øvelse for å bli en skikkelig god og presis helikopterpilot! Men, da står også Apa klar med utmerkelser i både bronse, sølv og gull!

Dersoml du bare vil øve litt på flyferdighetene, kan du når som helst ta en udramatisk, hyggelig patrulje-flytur i de samme områdene.

Spillet egner seg godt for barn mellom 3 og 6 år.
 
Kjent fra TV-serien
3 flotte miljøer i skog, fjell og by
6 unike redningsoppdrag 
Du styrer helikopteret!)
Eget patruljemodus

«Koptus på oppdrag» er et spill for de minste fra solide samarbeidspartnere; CreaCon og Ravn Studio.

Ustibaččaid Gávpot
Kopter bargame

Kopter ja Ábe leaba gearggus bargat! 

Helikopterspeallu unnimusaide mas leat gelddolaš doaimmat miehtá Ustibaččaid gávpogis. 
Don dat stivret Koptera go Ábe galgat vuolgit jáddadallat buollimiid, ohcat láhppon tuvravázzit ja doalvut dehálaš poastta. 

Son guhte speallá stivre helikoptera badjel muohtagáissáid, ruonas vuvddiid ja Ustibaččaid gávpoga. 

Speallán-mekanihka ja stivrennábbá lea vuogas ja álki,  muhto vai šaddá čeahpes helikopterpilohta, de ferte hárjehallat. Ja de lea ge Ábe gearggus bronsa, silba ja golle bálkkašumiiguin. 

Jus don háliidat dušše hárjehallat girdit, de sáhtát vaikko goas girddašat muosis almma hušša haga, juste dain guovlluin gos galggat bargat. 

Speallu heive mánáide gaskal 3 ja 6 jagi. 
Oahpis mánáid-tv:s. 3 fiinna birrasa sihke vuovddis, váris ja gávpogis. 6 sierra gádjunbarggu. Don stivret helikoptera. Sierra gádjunmodus. "Kopter bargame" lea speallu unnimusaide čeahpes ovttasbargoguimmiin CreaCon ja Ravn Studio.


      more

Get Venom!Venom is a high quality Snake Game for Single and Multiplayer.Play alone to get longer and longer... but don't eat yourself!Create or join a nearby game to play head-to-head with another player nearby... but make sure not to run into them!

This city is full of dangers – and you must be the biggest one! If you like animal simulators and horror movies about giant mutated predators, you’d love this game! Act like a fiendish beast from movie – chase citizens, cats, and dogs, attack cars and trucks! Be the most fearful creature – scaled Titanoboa snake - of these blocks with Venom Anaconda Snake Simulator 3D!
Become the most dangerous of city animals! Stay alerted all the time and maintain your snake’s health, energy and hunger rate to survive! Beware human warfare – tanks, helicopters even usual grenade launchers could be a problem! Attack first before they can do the same thing with you!
If you feel lonely – just create a family, make the nest, lay eggs, protect it from cops – and in a couple of minutes, you would have your own bunch of deadly slithery reptiles! Earn points for successive completion of missions to upgrade your giant boa snake - change the color of skin, buy new attack or other boosters!
Have fun playing Venom Anaconda Snake Simulator 3D!
Venom Anaconda Snake Simulator 3D features:
Be giant boa on the city streets!
Hunt for citizens and animals
Avoid tanks and police
Lay on eggs, protect your nest and raise up your little snakes
Customize your anaconda as you want
Feel like a giant carnivorous poisonous snake and start a hunt on streets of the big city with Venom Anaconda Snake Simulator 3D!


      more

Start your cobra adventure, my little hero, ‘cause today this cobra is you! Learn more about the behavior of this stunning poisonous creature in the human house surroundings! Here you’ll have several terrariums to live in, cruel rivals (for example, the dogs) and a lot of exciting moments – just download this Venom Cobra Snake Simulator and have fun!

Cobra is really poisonous and dangerous, but, in fact, any living being needs its friends! Here’s your chance to slither around the house in search of something really interesting… and maybe even troublesome! Some little bugs and rats have found their home in this large human’s house too, so find them all to have something delicious for your meal!

Beware of the large human’s dog – it was trained to protect the house from such reptiles as you! Don’t try to defeat it until your health, endurance and strength levels will be high! Be silent and quiet, find the other cobra snake to create your own terrarium family and protect it from sudden attacks! Check this stunning Venom Cobra Snake Simulator game and just enjoy it!

Complete wide range of exploration, mating, feeding, family and fighting missions, loot your rivals and get some useful points! Spend them all as you wish: unlock interesting colorful skins for your little cobra or power its stats up! Mind the levels of health, water, energy, and hunger – keep them all to stay alive longer!

Venom Cobra Snake Simulator features:
•	Unusual cobra snake pet simulation
•	Large human house to explore
•	Many interesting rivals (from little bugs and rats to the large dogs)
•	Wide range of different missions and quests (from exploration to the mating ones)
•	Many unlockable skins and power-ups
•	Chance to raise a family of little cobras
•	Fantastically colorful 3D graphics

Become the most powerful cobra snake of this human house of Venom Cobra Snake Simulator game!


      more

Start as a baby snake, get bigger by eating other snakes
Use your special moves in the death Arena to knock out other snakes.
If your head touches another player, you will die while, on the other hand they will also die if they touch you.
Once you hit them, eat them as fast as you can to gain more mass.
 If you're skilled or lucky, you have the chance to survive and to become the biggest snake.
Swipe your finger to guide your snake and avoid touching other snakes.
Gain more and more mass of other snakes and make the biggest snake ever!
Don't let them to kill you.
Kill them before they kill you.


      more

Destroy the whole human city being a large poisonous spider – revenge them all for your little brothers! Download Venom Spider Monster Attack game and be ready to power your giant body up and stand against the SWAT, police, military forces and maybe even snipers! Ruin everything around you and do everything possible to survive longer!Venom Spider Monster Attack features:•	Giant poisonous spider city rampage game•	Wide range of stunning abilities •	Chance to summon allies for help•	Many unlockable skins for your spider•	Police, SWAT, and military forces to fight with•	Various buildings to destroy and crash•	Amazing 3D modern city locationsCheck your skills as the real giant spider – download Venom Spider Monster Attack game and survive through many people’s attacks!

Vent Crawler gives you the ability to explore virtually infinite 3D mazes! These 3D mazes of varying size can prove to be a fun, though often futile mental exercise in spatial reasoning and memorization. In the early levels you may begin to feel as though these mazes can be traversed with simple tactics and memorization, but as the mazes grow in size you are sure to lose your bearings and your sanity as you find yourself hoping that at the very least you can find the beginning again just for the sake of seeing a familiar landmark.

Explore real 3D mazes! While most “3D” maze games are simply 2D mazes that you navigate in first person, Vent Crawler randomly generates mazes that will take you out of a plane and into a cube. This makes for much more challenging and rewarding mazes, the likes of which most have not experienced.

Gameplay by Chris Raff
Interface by Stephen Hanson


      more

It is a game of skill. Try to get the balloon in the blue boxes that are in the helping walls of a fan. Try the balloons fall to the ground and explode. Press the buttons to move the fan right and left.
If you put the fan below the balloon, the balloon will rise.
If you put the fan below the balloon and a little to the right, the balloon will rise and move slightly to the left.
If you put the fan below the balloon and a little to the left, the balloon will rise and move slightly to the right.
Get more points if less balloons explode. At the end of the game you can save your score and you can also submit your best score to an online database to compete with other players.


      more

column1: Ventivian Defender FREE - Pixel Steampunk Battles... of DOOM!
column6: The forces of Malden have crossed the line. They now invade someone else's homeland, your homeland. Ventivia is under attack, and you are the first line of defense. Take control of one of Ventivia's many defensive control towers and show the Maldenians that Ventivia is not so easily conquered.
Become the world’s largest venture capitalist by buying, selling and trading stock, all while trying to grow your own businesses.

Quick! Start building your empire!

Now anyone has a chance to be rich, and not only that, you can be the richest person in the world! You start with almost nothing, just $1,000 and a dream to build a business empire.

***IT’S EASY***
No difficult stuff, just pick a business and start stacking your money. Manage your business in the most creative way possible to earn more fortunes. Upgrade, sell, collect.

***HIGH QUALITY***
All graphics are high quality with an easy to use layout

***CHALLENGING***
As you progress, the businesses get riskier so be sure to manage your threat level and avoid conviction!

What are you waiting for? Download Venture Capitalist now and get started building your empire. Before you know it, you’ll be the richest person in the world!!!

Venture Capitalist is a free game but does offer in-app purchases for in game currency and crystals.

*****DOWNLOAD NOW FOR FREE*****


      more

The object of Venture is to acquire the most money. This is accomplished by building companies, merging companies and buying, selling and trading stock. Venture is a stock market simulation game.

Features:

Three levels of computer opponents. 

Four stock market simulation game play variations: 
- Standard 
- Urban Renewal - Be a good community member. Help support parks and recreation.
- Disasters - Take short cuts and your companies could pay the price.
- Defunct Companies - Not every business owner has the golden touch. Do you?


      more
Welcome to the Venture Game. Venture game is a stock market simulation app with real time market data. With over 6000+ of common stock selections, you are free to invest without any financial risk.

Take a trip down memory lane!

Venture Kid is a lovingly crafted 8-bit retro action platformer that goes beyond just pixels and chiptunes. It shines with excellent level design, highly entertaining action levels,  responsive controls and a great variety of bosses. 

Your Mission: 
The evil Dr. Teklov is about to build a secret weapon, disguised in his huge space fortress. Time is running out but our hero Andy stepped up to defeat him and fight his way through Teklovs minions. Join Andy and prepare yourself for a dangerous journey that demands great skill and determination. Will you succeed ? 

- 9 action packed levels and bosses 
- Chiptune soundtrack by Matt Creamer (Slayin) 
- 8 unique and useful Power-Ups to help you on your quest. 
- Many secret areas to find and explore 
- Highly accurate touch controls
- MFi Controller Support

---
This game is a premium product that can be fully played  without In-App Purchases. All purchase offers are completely optional and may help you beating the game.


      more

Assume the reins of a mega-conglomerate to build your very own metropolitan utopia!

Stores, houses, mansions--towers! The sky's the limit as you fashion your humble burg into the world's most powerful fiscal force! Place compatible structures near each other to craft specialty districts or "combos," adding flavor to your town while reaping big bonuses and boosting Land Price!

Your beloved residents will live their lives on the map of your choice, working to earn their daily dough to buy cars, houses, and even pets! Some might even hit the lottery jackpot...

Spearhead the most daring economic venture to date! Craft the urban dreamland of your fantasies!

Turn your device to rotate the screen, touch to scroll, and pinch to zoom in and out. 

Supports iPhone, iPod touch, and iPad. 
Note: Screen rotation and zoom are only available on iPhone 3GS and later, iPod touch 2nd generation and later, and iPad. 

The game now lets you switch between English and Japanese.

The Venture Zone Global was created with sight loss in mind and it’s fully accessible. Anyone can play, including sighted individuals.

In the Venture Zone Global, you will:

· create and name your own company
· choose products to sell based on different price points
· raise virtual cash with seed funding, a bank loan or friends and family

If you’re a beginner, turn on tutorial mode and a narrator will guide you through the game and teach you about the world of business.

You get to:

· brand your product
· market your product
· produce your product by outsourcing or set up your own factory
· sell through the web or through retail
· hire and fire staff
· analyze your sales and other data

Venus Dress up  offers a unique way of adding to your beauty  .

Create your look with the best dress matches for your body type and be your own personal stylist by choosing your favorite hair style, shoes, and makeup. Change the color of every item you pick to find the best mix and match for your look.

You can select your body shape, change your skin tone, and choose a makeup set that complements your skin tone and eye color. You can even change lipstick, eyelashes, and the shape of your eyebrow to create a stunning look.
Be your own personal fashion designer with our app by taking a selfie and use your face on the model, with all those makeup options, dresses, hairstyles and skin tones selections available to pick. And now is the time to choose your partner in this app and match their outfit with yours. You can even change your partner’s face by replacing it with a face you’d like.

Time to go to a party in your amazing look and stunning style !

Enjoy our app!

As a normally peace-loving fly, your life was turned upside down when an army of mutant Venus fly-traps ate your entire fly-family.  Now it's war.

Vera Blanc is a mystery / detective game. Take on the role of Vera Blanc, a young and beautiful woman with an extraordinary power: the ability to read other people's minds!

Daughter of Emmanuel Blanc, one of the richest people on Earth, she left her life of luxury to use her powers to work alongside paranormal detective Brandon Mackey.

The game plays like a visual novel / adventure game with several different paths to solve the mystery, and a collection of challenging minigames.

Featuring innovative comic-style art, with over 200 unique panels, Vera Blanc immerses you in the world of the supernatural as you play the detective!

Will you be able to solve the mystery?

Take on the role of Vera Blanc, a young and beautiful woman with an extraordinary power: the ability to read other people's minds!

In this second episode, our heroine travels to a small village in central Italy. The town's legendary ghost seems like nothing more than a quaint story, but a string of murders and suicides all point to the castle's ghost, and locals are getting scared.
The game plays like a visual novel / adventure game with several different paths to solve the mystery, and a collection of challenging minigames.

Featuring innovative comic-style art, with over 200 unique panels, Vera Blanc immerses you in the world of the supernatural as you play the detective!

“Vera” means truth in Latin, and VeraQuiz is a genuine  source for real world trivia games made by folks who have special hobbies and interests.   Even better, the trivia quiz is hosted by a photorealistic sprite (avatar) speaking in the person’s natural voice.  Now, direct to your iOS device, you can get a firsthand look at the true interests of real people showing off their knowledge by designing true/false, multiple choice, or pick the correct order quizzes to test their friends and share their expertise.  Share your scores on Facebook newsfeeds and/or Twitter, then challenge your friends to play the game.  After you start the app, log into social networks under the “First-timers Start Here” button.

Let's build a community.  Help us extend the wikiquiz database. Send us your questions on any topic. E-Mail info@verasprite.com . 

Our goal is to produce content appropriate for all ages covering a wide range of topics, and when appropriate, add cool photos and short tunes to create a fun multimedia experience. 
If you want to see some introductory remarks, we can combine VeraQuiz with our other sprite-hosted blogs in VeraApps.  We can share some special tidbits, then flip directly into the quiz by touching the VQ icon in the top right hand corner of VeraApps.

VeraSprite apps are low bandwidth multimedia shows that make sharing the real expertise of real people a pleasure on the iPhone.  Low bandwidth means low data usage means lower cost.  With an audio-visual experience that takes advantage of the rich graphics and sound fidelity of your iOS device, every VeraSprite experience is perfectly formatted for full screen viewing on an iPhone. 

VeraQuiz, real people, real passions, real expertise via VeraSprite(R).


      more

Master the present, past and past participle form of the 50 most common irregular verbs, through a gameplay specifically designed for it.

The school staff has become a horde of mutants. Only you can save them!

Return the school staff to the their human form.

Visit the Stationary to get different pen colors with amazing powers!

*ABOUT US*
At Chido Games, we believe we can bring cultures together through language learning and video games. 

We developed Verb Challenge English with only one goal in mind: making the best game ever for learning the irregular verb forms.

*SUPPORT*
If you are an English teacher or you are passionate about learning English, and this game made easy for you learning the verb forms, we’d love to hear your story. Please visit , follow, like, write or review us.

FOLLOW US: @ChidoGames
LIKE US: www.facebook.com/ChidoGames
REVIEW US HERE

We are eager to hear about your learning experience with Verb Challenge English!

Master the conjugation of both irregular and regular verbs (-ar, -er, -ir), through a gameplay specifically designed for doing so.148Apps"Learning how to conjugate verbs is dull, but Verb Challenge Spanish makes it much more interesting." Jennifer AllenFun Educational Apps"Verb Challenge Spanish-A Great Alternative to Boring Drills."Julie Peterson*DESCRIPTION*Verb Challenge Spanish is an engaging game for mastering verb conjugation in Spanish. You have a conjugation test coming soon? No worries, create your own level with the verb you need to practice the most in Practice Mode.If you need to know how to conjugate a verb ASAP, we have you covered! Access to a comprehensive conjugation chart for any verb in the game right from the title screen, so you don’t need any other reference app at all.Help the Mayans build their pyramid by making sentences in Spanish. Win the race against the sun, and bend the sun and time with amazing power-ups!*ABOUT ME*I believe we can bring cultures together through language learning and video games. I developed Verb Challenge Spanish with only one goal in mind: making the best game ever for learning how to conjugate in Spanish! To do so, I left flash-cards and multiple choice-like game mechanics behind. Verb challenge Spanish is a real and engaging game, not a series of boring multiple choice exercises disguised as a game. This game was designed and developed by the linguist and game designer Alberto Ramírez.*SUPPORT*If you are a Spanish teacher or you are passionate about learning Spanish, and this game made easy for you learning how to conjugate in Spanish, I’d love to hear your story. FOLLOW US: @ChidoGamesLIKE US: www.facebook.com/ChidoGamesWRITE US: chidogamesmx@gmail.com

column1: Verb Expert! Skill Building Practice for Past, Present, Future & Present Progressive Tense
column6:
** Happy Frog Apps is a Mom’s Choice Award Winner! Also featured on FunEducationalApps.com, TeachersWithApps.com, and more! **

Verb Expert quickly develops your learner's English verb skills. Learning happens in a fun game-like environment that motivates even hesitant learners. 

What parents say about our awesome apps:
*** 5 stars! Brilliant! An app that understands how kids actually learn. Thank you! 
*** 5 stars! My kids love this app because of the fun, silly sentences. I love it because it works!    

Verb Expert! provides:

-- Graduated practice at using each of the tenses with regular and irregular verbs.  The app covers present, present progressive, future and past tense. 

-- Students progress only when they demonstrate mastery.

-- Hints promote learning when students make an error.

-- Fun sentences keep students motivated. 

-- 'At a glance' reporting shows you instantly how your learner is doing and where more work is needed.

Being able to use verbs correctly is a key requirement for school success. This app provides a motivating environment for your learner to develop these important skills.

Our app is designed for children with language delays and adults or children learning English. 

Other benefits:

- FRUSTRATION FREE: Your child will always be guided to the correct answer. 

REWARD CENTER: Fun and engaging Reward Center increases motivation.

- EASY TO USE. Can be used independently (just hand it over: your child will know what to do!) or with a therapist/parent for intervention.

- EXTENSIVE REPORTING: for up to 10 players to suit the needs of parents, teachers and therapists. 

Our apps are designed for and tested by typical and special needs children. Testers include children with Autism and other special needs. Our apps work for them!

 To evaluate the app, download the free version, which has 4 free levels. Additional levels and additional players can be accessed with in-app purchases. (All levels can be purchased for $2.99 -- price may change.)

  If you prefer no in-app purchases, download the School Edition of this app, which includes all levels and up to 10 players.

We take customer service very seriously! If you ever have a problem or find that we've missed something, contact us at our website and we will do our best to fix the problem. 

We collect NO private information in our app. None! Our apps do not allow unrestricted web or social media access. We conform to the Children's Online Privacy Protection Act.


      more
