Practice mode introduces vocabulary and pronunciation. Learners then review the vocabulary with a fantastic matching game and master spelling with a challenging word scramble activity.

1- 14 vocabulary themes illustrated in bright attractive colors, displayed as flash cards with clear pronunciation.
2- Practice mode, game mode, and a review quiz at the end of the level. 
3- British and American English words clearly marked with respective flags.

 Level 2 features: 1- 13 vocabulary themes illustrated in bright attractive colors, displayed as flash cards with clear pronunciation.
2- Practice mode, game mode, and a review quiz at the end of the level. 3- British and American English words clearly marked with respective flags.

The app is 100% ad free .

THIS APP WORKS WITH THE CONNECTED TOY "SMART LETTERS"

Captivated by the beauty of illustrations of the Pictorial Webster's dictionary, which was created by John M. Carrera using some engravings, we took the pleasure in animating them in this app to introduce the alphabet and vocabulary to children.

This app is designed for children from 5 to 7 years old.
This app was developed with the assistance of schoolteachers and inspired by the Montessori method.
It is available in 8 languages!

EDUCATIONAL GOALS
All of the vocabulary that children acquire at a very young age is essential in learning to read.
With Vocabulle, children discover new words in a quirky and fun universe: artichoke, iguana, Zeus, or even tablet (which they already know)! 

2 modes available: 
- Each letter of the alphabet has several pictures that come to life, allowing them to discover the word spelled out in full.
- A 2-player mode invites you to a vocabulary battle with your kid ! The first to catch all the words wins.

FOR PARENTS
This app has no advertising. Useful information can be found in a Parents’ Corner. 

ABOUT MARBOTIC
Vocabubble is a Marbotic app, a publisher that designs and creates innovative educational solutions blending sensory material and digital interfaces. A wooden toy that interacts with tablets can be used to play with the app and stimulate the child’s senses even further! Find our connected toy on our website www.marbotic.com

column6: Are you fond of foreign languages and want to enrich your vocabulary - the App "Vocabula" is the right choice for you.The program, organized as a simple game, is easy to use and sets you the target to find pairs of words in two of five available languages : English, French, German, Romanian and Russian.The database contains 15 thematic categories,  including basic vocabulary:1.“Vegetables”2."Fruits"3."Birds"4."Insects"5."Weather"6."Colors"7."Family"8."Appearances"9."The human body"10. "Flat/House”11. "Shopping"12."Buildings"13.Education”14."Job and Work“;14."Time".Another five categories you can buy separately in InAppPurchase: 1."Animals";2. "Numbers";3."Clothes";4. "Character Traits";5."Food";With "Vocabula" you learn new foreign words in a very simple way and at the same time train your memory, because the words are associated with a particular topic and are repeated regularly.

Cette application très simple d'emploi va aider les élèves de cours moyen (9-11 ans) à acquérir ou à développer leur vocabulaire anglais. Trois activités sont disponibles :
- J'apprends : en appuyant sur les images, l'enfant découvre des mots ou des expressions qu'il peut s'entrainer à répéter à voix haute.
- J'entends : il entend un mot ou une expression et s'amuse à retrouver l'image correspondante.
- Je vois : il cherche parmi quatre propositions l'expression orale associée à l'image affichée.
 
18 thématiques sont abordées : les salutations, les sentiments, le temps qu'il fait, les lettres, les chiffres, les couleurs, les animaux, les actions, les ordres, les parties du corps, les objets familiers, la ville, les pays, etc.
 
L'élève disposera ainsi de tout le vocabulaire de base nécessaire à ses apprentissages.


      more

- J'entends : il entend un mot ou une expression et s'amuse à retrouver l'image correspondante.
- Je vois : il cherche parmi trois propositions l'expression orale associée à l'image affichée.
 
15 thématiques sont abordées : les salutations, les sentiments, le temps qu'il fait, les jours et les mois, les lettres, les chiffres, les couleurs, les animaux, les actions, la nourriture, les parties du corps, les objets familiers, etc.
 
L'enfant disposera ainsi de tout le vocabulaire de base nécessaire à ses premiers apprentissages.


      more

column6:

About BabyFirst:
BabyFirst is a global TV network made just for babies, toddlers and parents. Developed by educational experts, all BabyFirst content is designed to introduce babies to basic building blocks from numbers and language to music and art. Look for BabyFirst in the U.S. on Comcast, DIRECTV, Dish Network, AT&T U-verse, and more. www.babyfirsttv.com

Learn English vocabulary and phonics by practice through 8 games. Let your children enjoy to learn how to read, listen (phonics) and spell English. Your kids will enjoy learning in various games includes coloring book game, memory game, dot to dot game, matching game, jigsaw game, shadow puzzle game, and vocabulary flashcards & spelling.

You can switch the menu between English and Thai.

*** Who for " Kids Vocabulary Adventure Preschool Learning"? ***
- Preschool, pre-kindergarten, kindergarten, primary school / elementary school (Grade 1, Grade 2, Grade 3 Grade 4, Grade 5 and Grade 6) kids who like to learn English vocabulary.
- Parents who want to teach your child to learn to read listen and spell English vocabulary.
- Kindergarten teacher who wants to teaches our student to fun to learn English in the classroom.

*** Apps Includes 8 Games for Learning English Vocabulary ***
(1) Flashcards Game
Learn English vocabulary and phonics. Practice by watching flashcards and listening to English vocabulary phonics in animal, sea animal, insect, fruits, vegetable, occupation, transportation, sport, shape, and color.

(2) Spelling Game
Practice English vocabulary spelling. Drag letters A to Z to the correct position of each word. There are ten categories of vocabulary that includes
2.1 Animal Vocabulary.
2.2 Fruits Vocabulary.
2.3 Vegetable Vocabulary.
2.4 Sea Animal Vocabulary.
2.5 Insect Vocabulary.
2.6 Occupation Vocabulary.
2.7 Shape Vocabulary.
2.8 Color Vocabulary.
2.9 Sports Vocabulary.
2.10 Transportation Vocabulary.

(3) Shadow Puzzle Game
Learn by match a random picture of various vocabularies with a shadow that shows above. When you correct, it shows a sound of that vocabulary.

(4) Dot to Dot Connect Game
Learn by connecting the dot that random a start dot. When you complete, it shows a picture and sound on that vocabulary.

(5) Picture Memory Game
The memory training game for children to practice memory through a picture of various vocabularies, where children will remember their location or guess where the images match.

(6) Picture Jigsaw Game
Learn vocabulary by play a jigsaw. You can select a jigsaw in 6, 9, 12, 16, 24 and 30 pieces. If you finish in each picture, it will be said vocabulary phonics.

(7) Vocabulary Matching Game
Match your picture on the shadow in the train. If you correct, it shows a sound & phonics of each vocabulary. The game is random the vocabulary. You can play any time with funny.

(8) Coloring Book Game
Your children will enjoy learning English through coloring practice that comes with a variety of colors. You can use many colors, many brush size to coloring your image and place a many CUTE STICKER on your coloring image. Save your picture on your phone/tablet.

Build your vocabulary with Magoosh's free vocabulary game for your iOS device. Quiz yourself every day to learn the 1200 most important words!• 1200 vocab words picked by an expert tutor• Definitions and example sentences for every word• Basic, Intermediate, and Advanced vocabulary sections• Beat levels to unlock new words• Track your progress as you studyThis app gives you free access to all of Magoosh’s general, GRE, SAT, and TOEFL vocab quizzes. Sign in with a Magoosh account (or create a new one) to save your progress to the web. You can continue your practice online at http://gre.magoosh.com/builder/vocabularyCreated by experts======The entire wordlist is selected and defined with usage examples by Magoosh’s expert tutors, led by Chris Lele. He has been teaching the GRE for more than 10 years, runs a popular vocabulary series on YouTube and he’s also written an eBook on vocabulary. He is unbeatable in Scrabble, or any other word game for that matter.Designed for fun and learning that really sticks======Each level you beat unlocks a harder one: more words and more advanced vocabulary. Words you don't know will be repeated until you master them, using spaced repetition which has been shown to be a very effective memorization strategy.About Magoosh======We're an online test prep company with a focus on teaching the GRE, GMAT, SAT, and TOEFL through videos and personalized customer support.In addition to our online course, we blog about words, roots, formulas, grammar, problem solving, quantitative reasoning, and reading comprehension along with study guides and study tips. Articles from the blog have been compiled into 3 separate free ebooks with over 6,000 downloads. Check it out at http://magoosh.com/More study tools======Search the app store for "magoosh" to continue your prep. Learn all the math, verbal, and writing you need to know for the test!Have any questions? Please ask!======Customer satisfaction is incredibly important to us. If you have any questions or comments, please send us an email at help@magoosh.com or call 1-855-MAGOOSH and we’ll get back to you as quickly as we can. If you’re outside the US, you can also reach us at +1-510-214-0212“I didn’t have much time to prepare for the GRE, and Magoosh made it possible for me to succeed on the test in a short period of time. I looked at Kaplan GRE, Barron’s, and Princeton Review products, and I can confidently say that Magoosh was definitely the best.”“The team is really great and actually cares about your score as much as they would care about their own. Simply the best.”

Play Vocabulary Game and improve your English Language skills and general knowledge.

Fun to play and educational. 

Become a master wordsmith!

Download Vocabulary Game for free and try it out. The aim of the game is to unscramble the letters that appear on your screen and you are given a word definition or clue to the meaning of the word. Vocabulary Game improves your anagram skills. If you like crosswords you will love this word game. There are five to nine letter words and there are five levels for each group of letters.

Play and learn new words daily to improve your vocabulary extensively.

Level one five letter words is a simple way to start but you must achieve a certain percentage to advance to the next level. 

If you are feeling confident you can start with eight or nine letter words. Basically this app improves your vocabulary, adds more words to your personal lexicon. Learning new words extends general knowledge and makes you more articulate in conversation and communication.

There are daily challenges and a leader board so you can match your skills against others all around the world.
The English language is a very rich language. It is claimed it is the richest language in the world. There are over 500,000 words compared to 100 000 in French and 185 000 in German. There are so many words in English to express slightly different meanings for the same action or object. The verb “to seek” can mean “to find, to look for, to ask, to demand, to probe, to delve into, to investigate” and many many more.
Most of us have nowhere near a 500 000 vocabulary. But why not try to master new words, widen your vocabulary, add to your communication skills and become more articulate.
Vocabulary Game can really help you to learn new words and challenge you daily. After a while of improving your vocabulary you will begin to see the patterns in the English language and eventually you may be added to the Word Genius Hall Of Fame.


      more

You get a definition and then you guess the corresponding word. It's easy to play but hard to master and makes you really smart.

You can also make in app purchases of additional definitions to further challenger yourself. There are Intermediate, Advanced, Expert, Genius, Law, Biology, and Chemistry dictionaries to purchase. Vocabulary Genius contains ads which may be removed with an in-app-purchase. Vocabulary Genius caters to all skill levels. There is also a cool word of the day feature so you'll learn a new word every day!

Can you guess the dictionary trivia word? It’s like a fun puzzle or quiz that anyone can play to learn new English words. Cool music and sound effects give a calming experience that’ll keep your brain active and relaxed. Start as a student and attain master status in no time at all.

You need to get all the cards turned over in order to get to the next level. ===========================================================Presented by: Po Leung Kuk Tin Ka Ping Millennium Primary School Powered by: Innovative Net Learning Limited ** The project is funded by the Education Bureau, Hong Kong Special Administrative Region - "Pilot Scheme on e-Learning in Schools". ===========================================================

Vocabulary Matching 02 - Jobs

“Vocabulary Matching” series is an engaging memory matching game which adds fun to learning English. It is suitable for revision purposes. You can play this game on your own, in pairs or in small groups. Let's see who can get the most pairs at the end of the game.

How to play:
You have 10 seconds to remember the positions of the matching pairs before the game starts. Simply turn two cards over and find the correct pair. Match up all the cards as fast as you can to view the hidden picture.

Very useful for tracking ones children's vocabulary learning progress."Our Vocabulary Prep series was designed to improve vocabulary skills in the classroom and at home: • This free app contains words from 3rd grade through 8th grade, as well as more advanced SAT-level vocabulary• Study groups of vocabulary words at your own pace with guided step-by-step learning• Specifically appropriate content chosen at each grade level• Students can read through words and definitions as many times as they need for review• Word and definition quizzes are used to reinforce learning, ensuring that students understand each word in a section before they continue• Aligned with CCSS - Common Core State Standards• Email student test results to share their progress• Increase student vocabulary skills and their scores!Teachers: sets of vocabulary words from this app can be assigned as activities in Apple's Schoolwork appWord list includes: ambition  anticipatebravebudgetcareerclever elegantfamiliarfortunatefragilegenuineglimpsehumble illustriousjovialjusticelinger modifynotableoutlinepersistrequestsearchsimilarsincerethrivevanquish& many more! *With practice you can achieve your best scores!* We love to hear from you! This app is targeted for Elementary and Middle Schoolers to test their vocabulary. It has been created by a parent after reviewing multiple apps that cater to SAT, GRE and other competitive exams targeted for higher grades. -A great vocabulary is the key to success in many careers, so feel free to challenge yourself to the quiz, even if you are not a school going child. The word and the sentence choices have been carefully reviewed to make sure that they are appropriate to the grade level. -Junior Level(free) category contains 120 words and over 150 questions and is targeted for KG to 3rd grade students. -Junior level(2014) category challenges you in over 1000 words and definitions.-Senior Level(free) category contains 120 words and over 200 questions and is targeted for 4th to 8th grade students. -Senior level(2014) category challenges you in over 1000 words and definitions.-Senior level(2015) category challenges you in over 1000 words and definitions.-GameCentre integrated with multiple leaderboards support to present category wise high scores. How to play?-Once the test starts you will be presented with 30 multiple choice questions. Each question has 4 word choices, you have about 30 seconds to answer.Correct answer gets a maximum of 14 points(option turns green) with points decreasing over time, wrong answer loses 5 points(option turns red). -The order of questions and the answer options are jumbled to keep the retries interesting and challenging. -If your child is preparing for the vocabulary bee competitive exam conducted by the highly coveted north south foundation, this may serve as a good practice. Please note that this app is not affiliated with north south foundation.- With over 350 word definitions in the free category and over 3000 in the premium categories you can use this App to quiz  your vocabulary or in preparation for SAT, GMAT, GRE, TOEFL as well.You can contact us with issues/suggestions via email at eduvisionhelp@gmail.com

Download Vocabulary Quizzes now !!!

how good are you at synonyms and antonyms? test your knowledge with synonyms and antonyms quiz 

vocabulary synonyms and antonyms is a fun educational game for kids and all ages to practice matching synonyms and antonyms. this app is great for building vocabulary and enhancing reading comprehension. there are 3 levels to play: begin, intermediate and advance 

a synonym is a word that has the same or nearly the same meaning as another word. an antonym is a word that has the opposite meaning of another word. 

how to play: 
- you have to switch letters until you get the right word. 

1. Beginning Level 

beginners should start here. It's not a bad place to start for intermediate levels to start either. These exercises can be tricky. If you are struggling, don't get discouraged! these exercises are tough. they are meant to challenge you. 

2. Intermediate Level 

intermediate exercises are meant for students looking to take their vocabulary to the next level. while some of the words in this section may seem easy, others are clearly not. also, keep a careful eye on the synonyms/antonyms sign. it is easy to fall into traps looking for the wrong one. 

3. Advanced Level 

advanced is the most challenging we have to offer. on them you will find the top 250 most common SAT and GRE test vocabulary words. so, think you are up to the challenge?

Vocabulary Practice: Greek and Latin Root Words Features: - Correct answers are highlighted when question is missed - Questions get progressively harder - Smart Learning review levels offer practice to make learning really stick - Option to adjust level of difficulty - Students win medals and points for completing sections of the game - Fully integrated in Game Center with seven special achievements - Does not require an internet connection to play - Play the first three levels for free up to the Bronze medal - Option to purchase additional levels with new questions Practicing the questions on this app will not only reinforce language skills, but also makes it easier to complete the game on the fun online learning sites Always-Icecream.com and Clever-Dragons.com, where kids earn virtual currency for each level they complete. With this currency, children can unlock fun and creative games.

VocabularySpellingCity AppImprove Reading Comprehension and VocabularyThis app is designed for students of our Premium Members. Visit our website to sign up today.More About VocabularySpellingCityVocabularySpellingCity is a research-proven tool that helps teachers and parents meet the challenge of providing meaningful, intentional, and extended vocabulary practice for students while improving fluency and retention. Parents, schools and districts across the country and the world continue to use VocabularySpellingCity to improve vocabulary retention and reading comprehension.With 35+ interactive word games and thousands of pre-made word lists, our app helps build literacy skills in a fun and engaging way!With each game, students can see, hear, speak, write, break down, and play with words including high frequency words, developmental spelling words, and vocabulary. This helps students strengthen their literacy skills in an effective and long-lasting way.*Access to the full features of this app is limited to VocabularySpellingCity Premium Members. To go Premium, visit our website: www.spellingcity.comKeeping up, catching up, or getting ahead in vocabulary retention and comprehension can be fun and easy! Rather than memorizing flashcards or reading textbooks, our specially designed games offer a wide variety of interactive ways to improve literacy skills.STUDENTS catch up, keep up, and stay ahead on your literacy skills at school, at home, or on-the-go. PARENTS help kids develop effective reading skills, which are key for success in school (and in life)! TEACHERS help students continue their learning and review material in or out of the classroom. RESEARCH-BASED METHODSThe 35+ interactive games and activities let students learn and retain words more effectively through:Multiple Encounters• The games provide diverse and repeated opportunities to encounter new words, greatly aiding in retention.Multiple Modalities• With voice recordings, interactive sound boxes, animations, syllable activities and contextual sentences, these games create a rich learning experience for students.Spacing• Students can create and save review lists and pair them with different games for continued repeated practice for greater retention. Word Selection• Our ready-made word lists support literature, academic vocabulary, content area vocabulary, and informational texts from the CCSS. Studying with these targeted lists can improve student performance across all aspects of their academic career.Self-Testing• Our self-testing activities give students this opportunity, while also helping them identify gaps in their knowledge, so that they can prepare for school evaluations and be sure to master the material.FEATURES• 9 free spelling, vocabulary, reading and phonics games• Pre-made and customized word lists• 35+ games with a Premium Membership• Automatic tracking and progress reports with a Premium MembershipUPGRADEWhen you go Premium, you gain access to all 35+ vocabulary, spelling, phonics and writing activities, as well as student records and assignments. Visit our website, at www.spellingcity.com, to learn more.Since our founding in 2008, we have received numerous awards for our website and app, including the 2017 and 2016 SIIA CODiE award in the “Best Game-Based Curriculum Solution” category. We have also ranked among Homeschool.com’s Top 100 Educational Websites every year since 2009.

"VOCABULYNX est une petite merveille ..."Agnès Desjobert, orthophoniste***" Perfectionner sa lecture en jouant au loto ! Un joli coup de coeur " 4,5 étoiles sur app-enfant***Cette version de VOCABULYNX correspond au niveau de lecture du CE2 ( lecture des mots irréguliers ) et peut être utilisée en autonomie par les enfants, il suffit de choisir un niveau de difficulté et d'essayer de trouver l'unique paire d'image/mot le plus vite possible ( ou pas ) !!  Vous pourrez jouer en famille en utilisant les niveaux plus difficiles pour les adultes.MODE ENTRAINEMENT :_ Affichage de la solution après 3 essais infructueux_ Pas de limite de temps._ Pas de scoreMODE 10 CARTES :_ Affichage de la solution après 3 essais infructueux_ Pas de limite de temps._ Trouvez 10 paires uniques le plus vite possible_ Score ( valorisant ) calculé en fonction du nombre d'erreur, de réussite, et des niveaux sélectionnés. _ Indication du nombre d'essai, d'erreur, pourcentage de réussite, chronoMODE 2 MINUTES :_ Affichage de la solution après 3 essais infructueux_ Partie de 2 minutes ( concentration longue )._ Trouvez le plus de paires uniques en 2 minutes_ Score ( valorisant ) calculé en fonction du nombre d'erreur, de réussite, et des niveaux sélectionnés. _ Indication du nombre d'essai, d'erreur, pourcentage de réussite, chrono+ 6 niveaux+ Mélange automatique+ Des milliers de pages possiblesExemple de mots utilisés : Wagon, Tronc, Scooter, Puzzle, Skate ...***     LE MOT DE L'ORTHOPHONISTE :    Ce jeu peut être utilisé pour la stimulation de l'attention neurovisuelle des enfants et des adultes."    Un matériel à utiliser selon les compétences du patient et des objectifs ...    L'attention est toujours fortement requise par le jeu mais l'effort est facilité par les niveaux disponibles :    _ CP1 : la lecture demande moins d'effort  avec des graphies simples    _ CP2 et CE1 : toujours des mots concrets, du vocabulaire courant, seule la complexité des graphies varie.    Dans le cadre des troubles neurologiques,  les aphasiques notamment, trouveront autonomie et plaisir.    Agnès Desjobert -    ( orthophoniste, spécialisée en neurologie )***Vocabulynx est une application de la collection Adaptiim

VocabUScary is a word game which can help you practice your English vocabulary.
Are you tired of boring ways of improving your vocabulary? VocabUScary is exactly what you need. Prepare for tests, learn thousands of new words, and have fun at the same time. 
This game has three levels: 
1. Common words: This is specially useful for non-English speakers. Still, if you are an English-speaker you can improve your focus by playing this level.
2. SAT words: Preparing for the SAT? Learn advanced words along with their meanings.
3. GRE words: Learn advanced words commonly used in the GRE verbal test, along with their meanings.


      more

World's First Voice-Controlled Fighting Game! Summon historic icons to fight for you with your voice and customize skill commands based on your own sayings!Got featured from the Appstore for over 2,000 times!

COMBAT THAT REACTS TO YOUR VOICE
•Sensitive Sound Recognition Engine - Attack, dodge, block, and cast devastating abilities all with the simple command of your voice!
•Individual Voice Optimization - The more you play, the better the game recognizes your voice.

ENJOY THE FREEDOM OF CUSTOMIZATION 
•Personalized Abilities Names - You can create the names of the abilities for your own play style.
•Selectable Combinations - Create your own sets of abilities.
•Customizable load out - Equipping yourself with armor and weaponry. Have more fun with it!

RELEASE YOUR STRESS
Feeling frustrated? Having trouble with your boss? Did getting tired​ of work? Arguing with your boyfriend/girlfriend? Express your emotions by yelling it out in Vocal Warrior!

GRIPPING STORY
The story takes place in the mid-14th Century. The hero of this game is an 18-year-old boy called Macro. He is a descendant of Marco Polo, the most famous Italian explorer in the world. At the age of 10, Macro goes to China and learns martial arts from the best Kung Fu Master in the world. One day, a mysterious man behind a black mask murders Macro’s Master and Macro falls into a well during the fight. 

The well is a five-dimensional space that could travel through any time and any region. A voice tells Macro that the only way to revenge is by gaining the power through fighting against the greatest people in the world. In order to learn and become a much stronger warrior, Macro starts his adventure…

CONTACT US
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/vocalwarrior
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Vocal_Warrior
Website: www.centaurstech.com
Wechat:VocalWarrior

column6:
Enrich your vocabulary, english or french.

Learn new words from a list or play a vocabulary contest against the machine.

Get brighter, learn 10 new words everyday.

¡La mejor aplicación para los más pequeños de la casa!

¿Quieres que tus hijos aprendan el trazo de las vocales de manera divertida? ¡Con la ayuda del koala Turpín tus peques serán los primeros de la clase! La aplicación Aprende Vocales con Turpín se ha desarrollado pensando solo en nuestros hijos, la generación del futuro.

Como padres siempre queremos tratar de fomentar el estímulo por el aprendizaje. Para ello, esta recomendada aplicación para móvil es una de las mejores opciones en la actualidad. A través de diez historias diferentes, tu hijo podrá disfrutar como se merece mientras aprende cada una de las vocales, tanto mayúsculas como minúsculas.

Nuestro juego educativo le proporciona a nuestros hijos ganas de aprender jugando.

Estimula su capacidad ilimitada de aprendizaje.

Fácil de usar y muy intuitivo. Esto ayudará a desarrollar su curiosidad y formar sus gustos desde una edad temprana.

Aumento de su capacidad cognitiva. Mejora su atención mediante una estimulación y entrenamiento sencillo y dinámico.

Acquiring the base vocabulary is an essential part of learning a new language, which is often overlooked in traditional courses. Vocatrain is made to give you a fun way to aid your progress by combining entertaining games with daily challenges and a customizable dictionary tailored by you to your own needs. Beginners and advanced learners alike are able to pick and choose words they encounter in their daily lives and rotate them into their studying sessions. Practice 5 minutes a day with flashcards, anagrams, quizzes or slice your way through your vocabulary with Word Ninja!Vocatrain supports you using a smart algorithm that selects words based on your usage frequency and repetition. You will get a suggestion on what games to play each day, help you build a habit of continuous practicing and your progress is tracked in your profile. Time to study! Features: ● A comprehensive dictionary fully customizable to your skill-level and studying needs● An automated training schedule to help you stay on the ball● 7 Games keeping you engaged while learning your new language● An interactive VR-Room to train your vocabularyNew games will be added soon!Available Languages:German for English SpeakersSend any feedback to feedback@vocatrain.iowww.vocatrain.io"vocatrain" contains only vocabulary learning tools. Please, do not download this app if you want to learn grammar.

GAME RULES

1. Mission
Watch the image and guess the correct word. 10 questions per round.

2. ​Single Player
Guess the correct word before time runs out. You receive 10 gold coins per correct answer. The timer is set to 5 seconds by default. You can change this in Settings but then you will not earn any coin.

3. Multiplayer
Here, you must be faster than your opponent. The timer is set to 5 seconds and cannot be changed. You can play against (1) any connected player in the world, or (2) a friend. When playing with a friend, one player must create a room and a secret code. The second player can enter the room with that code. You need 100 gold coins to play a Multiplayer game: the winner takes 100 coins from the loser.

4. Settings
You can choose your username and adjust game settings here. You can change your username anytime (no registration / login required).*

5. Stats
Stats keeps a record of your performance. "Force" is your average score x win rate. Force only activates when you have played both Solo and Multiplayer games.

6. Match Log
Match Log shows the results of your last 5 battles.

*This app does not collect any personal data from the users.

If you want more information or have any question, please visit:
http://www.play2smart.com
https://facebook.com/Play2Smart
https://twitter.com/Play2Smart
https://instagram.com/play2smart

Want to play your old "Voice of the Mummy" board game, but the record player is broken? No problem! Use this app to take the place of your broken player. Game not included - just the mummy's voice!

Voice of the Mummy was the best board game ever created by the Milton Bradley company, and it was a ground-breaking product back in 1971. It had a three-level pyramidal board centered around a large, detailed sarcophagus that spoke to the players when a switch was flipped. Inside was a miniature record player, and each side of the record containing twenty randomized instructions for the players to follow. My family and I spent many hours listening to the spooky voice telling us to avoid the Slimy Snails of Aro, the One-Eyed Giant Mandrill, the Unholy Snakes of Amon, or the Death brought on by the Screeching Green Pestilence. 

Unfortunately, my game is over forty years old now, and the record player hasn’t worked for many years. Rather than paying someone to fix it, I made a little iOS app to play randomized messages in its place.

Flip the switch on the sarcophagus to play a random message. Tap the "i" icon in the lower-right, or press-and-hold to bring up a menu to flip the record for the second part of the game play. Hearing-impaired folks can even play the game now by turning on closed-captioning - read the instructions on the screen as the mummy says them!

TO PLAY the Voice of the Mummy game with this app, you will still need the physical board game and all its pieces; this app merely replaces the functionality that a broken record player can no longer provide.

Referring to the advices from teachers and parents of kids who attend LITALICO classrooms, this game app was created for children who have difficulties controlling the volume of their voice.
The rule is simple that everyone, from kids to adults, can enjoy playing the game.

As kids play the game, we hope them to be able to control the volume of their voice by telling them to speak like "with the voice of a mouse" or "with the voice of a lion."

Void of Heroes - Epic, dark mech multiplayer battle royale and team battle in the far future!

Play either in team death match or new type of battle royale mode, built around a vertically rising death zone, instead of the common constricting circle!

Void of Heroes is a comic series and a mech battle royale game on mobile that puts you in control of dark future Mechs, their pilots and more! Void of heroes features a highly customisable skill system based on three trees you can choose from to create the ultimate mix of combat prowess to defeat your enemies. Crush your enemies with the varied weapons available to you, and choose a Mech that suits your gameplay to compete in the unforgiving battlegrounds deep underground.

Create the trinity of war: the mech, pilot and suit. Tweak the abilities of each component, and create combinations to rule the battlefield. Choose your pilot, take control of a mech, and suit up with your choice of battle harness to create the ultimate combination of battlefield dominating mech.

Void of Heroes features:
• NEW! Battle Royale 10 player survival arena
• Fast paced 4vs4 team death match multiplayer mech battle arena
• Epic Mechs with powerful weapons
• Mighty pilots with unique skills
• Tactical suits capable of boosting the union of mech and pilot
• Realistic physics based effects
• Smooth controls with joypad support

Are you Hero enough to survive the Void?
Introducing a fast paced multiplayer battle royale and team battle Mech FPS with a involved skill system and a comic series highlighting the experiences of one particularly unfortunate soul trapped in the void. 

A competitive, multiplayer mech battle royale and team death match, first person shooter game for mobile! Check out more information at www.voidofheroes.com and join the forums!

Follow Void of Heroes on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter for the most recent updates!

Build a deck as you battle across the galaxy, gathering powerful cards along the way. With strategy and a bit of luck you might be able to reclaim the Eyes of Chronos.A single-player adventure, play with 500+ cards and three unique classes to engineer a custom deck to your own design. Rooted in the simple hit-or-stand mechanics of blackjack, Void Tyrant is an easy to understand roguelike with engrossing depth. Battle quirky aliens, disarm traps, upgrade your spaceport, and face off with the sinister Wruut.Newcomers or seasoned veterans alike will enjoy deck building in Void Tyrant.FEATURES- Strategic deck building and card-based combat.- Four classes to choose from, each with its own strategy- Upgrade your town for new powers and adventures.- Collect blueprints and craft new ships with special abilities and cards- Powerful artifacts stuffed into shiny treasure chests.- Free with ads or convert to premium (NO ADS) with one purchase.- Traps, strange aliens, and lots of other surprises...

Battle enemies in this classic arcade style game with an augmented reality twist. You encounter a dimensional void, and it’s not empty. Waves of enemies emerge, and it’s up to you to battle them off.  However, all is not lost!  You’re capable of using their technologies against them!  Collect power-ups to push past the relentless onslaught! Will you prevent their invasion or succumb to the void?FEATURES:• Solo Arcade Action!• Wave-based gameplay!  How far can you get?• Player Power-ups provide additional offensive and defensive abilities!• Intuitive button-free gameplay!• Support for up to 4 spectators, allowing your friends to watch you play from their own devices!• Track your high scores with local leaderboard!• Play offline - No internet connection required! HOW TO PLAY:1. Move your ship by moving your device in real-world space.2. Aim at enemies to fire.3. Avoid incoming enemy fire.4. Collect power ups by flying into them.5. Survive as long as you can!  Beat your high score! TIPS:• When placing the Void on a surface, be sure to choose a textured surface• Ensure your play environment is adequately lit• AR is typically better on multi-camera devices• If the AR world loses cohesion, restart the app• Doesn’t work while moving (eg: in a vehicle) This game is a tech demo put forth by mobileforming, LLC

Vokus is a fun Spanish language vocabulary builder for learners of all levels. Created by a Cognitive psychologist and expert language teacher, it is designed to help you learn and easily recall hundreds of common and useful Spanish words.

It has all the goodies:
+ Word meaning and translation
+ Pronunciation helper
+ Memory enhancing imagery
+ Spaced repetition
+ Gamification
+ Progress stats
+ Support for dark mode
+ Modern UI
+ Nice animations
+ Support for English and Russian (other languages coming soon)
+ Zero distractions, no ads, no pesky subscriptions.

Most apps give you just basic or obscure words and focus too much in translation. Vokus breaks the mold by focusing on useful words and helping you recall them when needed, thus enhancing your fluidity when speaking the Spanish language.

Huge fireballs rain down as hot fast pyroclastic flows run down the mountain side!

Dig your way into the surface, and let the lava flow

If you are seeking an adventure you have come to the right spot! Every game has infinite possible levels, each more labyrinthine than the last. The user has the opportunity to play in two different modes, easy and hard. In the easy version the user can solve the game at a leisurely speed, while in the hard version the user is forced to keep up their speed or risk falling into the boiling lava. Clear all the tracks to proceed to the next level!

In the easy version, the cart will stop at each junction until the user tells it where to go. You don't have to wait for it to stop though: if the user swipes while the cart is moving, it will move in that direction at the next junction.

In the hard version the cart won't stop at each junction - if you haven't told it which way to go yet, it will keep going straight. Plan your moves ahead and move quickly!

Controls: Swipe the screen in the direction you want the cart to move. The cart cannot change course while on a one-way track! It can only change directions at the junctions.

This game is completely free, has no in-app purchases, and does not require an internet connection.

Check out the video walkthrough on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z89HxMawHm0 

Keep the cart from falling into the boiling lava and experience a new adventure. Good luck!

Music Credit: The music for this game is "90 Vie Organique Moog" by Bauchamp. It is available in the public domain.

YOUR DREAMS OF FLYING BECOME A REALITY!

Centuries ago, two inventors, the Eulenstein brothers, attempted to make their dreams a reality. In the Voletarium, their legendary workshop, they built a series of flying machines before one day in 1825 disappearing mysteriously without a trace. What happened to them? Did they simply give up? Or did they succeed in building the first functioning flying machine, the Volatus II?

Two young descendants of the Eulenstein brothers, Emily and Lawrence, have made it their task to find the truth. Follow the trail of the legendary Volatus II and become a SKY EXPLORER!

- Design your own flying machines
- Explore foreign countries at staggering heights 
- Collect new parts for your flying machines 
- Experiment with wings, boosters and cockpits
- Improve your flying machines to master exciting challenges in the air 
- Compete with other members of the Adventure Club

Still dreaming? Or do you think you have what it takes to become a real SKY EXPLORER?

By the way: the real-life Voletarium was extensively renovated by the Adventure Club in the grounds of Europa-Park and is open to visitors! In the Voletarium, you can even collect an exclusive flying machine with the QR collector. Not only that, you also have the opportunity to use further In-Game features like the treasure hunt or selfie spots. 
You can also experience a Sky Explorers Virtual Reality flight on the Alpenexpress Coastiality at Europa-Park, or directly from the Coastiality App. 

Information for parents: Voletarium: Sky Explorers can be downloaded and played free of charge. Some objects in the game can be purchased with real money. These In-App purchases can be deactivated in the device settings. 

You can find up-to-date information about the mobile game at: 
Voletarium-TheGame.com
Facebook.com/vskyexplorers

Die Pusteblume-App bietet Ihren Kindern unterhaltsame und pädagogisch wertvolle Anwendungen, die dabei helfen Logik, kognitive Arbeitsweisen und räumliches Vorstellungsvermögen zu entwickeln. Mit Vobi, dem Volksstimme-Biber, spielend zu mehr Wissen und Allgemeinbildung. Passend zur wöchentlich erscheinenden Pusteblume-Kinderzeitung gibt es nun auch eine Pusteblume-App zum kostenfreien Download.

Die App ist in zwei Bereiche aufgeteilt:

Elternbereich

·         Eltern finden in der App Veranstaltungen und Aktivitäten, die in Sachsen-Anhalt und näherer Umgebung stattfinden

·         den perfekten Kindergeburtstags planen - Checklisten und zahlreiche weitere Tipps und Tricks für die perfekte Party samt Essens- und Spielvorschlägen

·         kindgerechte und leckere Back- und Kochrezepte - auch aus der Region

·         für den Notfall genügt ein Klick auf „Notdienste“, um zu erfahren, welcher Arzt und welche Apotheke im Land gerade Bereitschaftsdienst haben

·         die Anschriften und Kontaktdaten aller Schulen im Land

Kinderbereich

Für Schüler aber auch für jüngere Kinder wurde die App entwickelt und lädt zum interaktiven Spielen und Lernen ein:

·         Zur Vertiefung, Wiederholung oder auch zur Förderung der Lerninhalte in der Schulegibt es unterrichtsbezogene Rätselfragen. Diese sind in Klassenstufen 1 bis 4 unterteilt. Während der Aufgabenlösung trainiert Ihr Kind kognitive Funktionen, wodurch die Aufmerksamkeit und das Gedächtnis verbessert werden – falsch beantwortete Fragen werden wiederholt abgefragt.

·         Eine Reihe von Malvorlagen fördert die Phantasie und die Feinmotorik Ihres Kindes. Die virtuell erschaffenen Kunstwerke gehen nicht verloren. Diese können direkt in der App gespeichert und wieder abgerufen werden.

·         Was war nochmal die Tour de France oder was genau ist eigentlich ein Orkan? Das große Vobi-Lexikon hat die passende Antwort parat – hier finden Sie alle kindgerecht aufbereiteten Erklärungen, die täglich in der Volksstimme erscheinen. Damit der Spaß nicht zu kurz kommt, können Kinder außerdem eine Runde „Paare finden“ spielen. Dieses Spiel fördert die Konzentrationsfähigkeit, das Erinnerungsvermögen und trainiert das Unterscheiden und Erkennen von Muster.

·         Beim Mathe-Quiz löst Ihr Kind unterschiedliche Aufgaben des kleinen und großen Einmaleins. Das Kopfrechnen verbessert das logische Denkvermögen und trainiert das Gehirn Ihres Kindes. Die Aufgaben helfen dabei spielerisch eine solide Grundlage für Mathematik zu schaffen.

·         Die App enthält Witze, die so richtig Spaß machen und Ihr Kind bestimmt noch nicht kennt.

Die Pusteblume-App ist eine Welt voller Tipps und Tricks, Spaß und Lerninhalten für die ganze Familie.  
Die Benutzeroberfläche ist deutschsprachig, familienfreundlich und interaktiv aufgebaut.

Volla is an extraordinary game for your brain, where you pick the cards and match with another. Volla, is beyond a regular pair matching game with the content and the unique design.

You are going to enjoy with hundreds of different puzzles with different content. Match the pairs as fast as you can so you can gather more points. Also, your successive correct answers will produce a combo, which also grants more points to you at the end of the game.

All cards will be visible once for the initial 5 seconds of the game. Then all of the cards will be flipped and invisible to you. At this point, It is up to you to remember the figures on the cards and match them one by one. Once you match all of the cards "Volla !", you will pass the level. 

Volla is not just a pair matching game. It is uniquely designed for everybody. So whatever your age is you can play Volla. The difficulty will increase as the level increments. It is a great opportunity for you to test your brain and challenge yourself.

Every 40 level the difficulty will increment. Every 10 level there will be checkpoints. These checkpoints are the milestones that will save your life. Try to match squares as fast as you can to earn combos. Combos will be added to your final score. While you try to finish fast be careful, make sure your remaining lives are still exists.

Volla is a unique card matching game with the rich content. You will find a lot of figures on the cards while playing. These figures may contain smileys, plants, foods, clothes, weather symbols, sport symbols and so on.

Volla is not designed for only kids or adults. It is designed for everyone. It is beneficial for you to play every day to improve your brain functions and keep it healthy. For kids, we recommend easy and medium levels. For adults we recommend medium and hard levels.

You can keep track of your statistics while playing Volla. The points you will collect will be more as you pass the difficulties. You can find the statistics about your high score and total score.

Enjoy.

Exclusive to iOS, Volleyball Pong is a multi-level arcade game that's intuitive to play - you simply drag your paddle across your side of the court to deflect the ball over the net into your opponent's half. As you progress through the levels the game speed increases and the computer player gets tougher to beat.

Your paddle is curved so you can direct the ball over the net and you score goals by getting the ball to hit the floor in your opponent's side. You can bounce the ball off the back-wall or net and you have unlimited touches in your own half - just don't score an own goal!

The 2 player game is awesome and you can choose the speed of the game from the pedestrian 'slow' to the insane 'ultra-fast'.

The single-player game has a World Record for the highest level that's been won - see if you can match it or even beat it! You start with 3 lives and you only lose a life if you lose a game to the computer. If you lose all 3 lives you can upgrade to unlimited lives.

Tip: Accelerate into the ball for extra power.


      more

Exclusive to iOS, Volleyball Pong is a classic multi-level arcade game that's intuitive to play - you simply drag your paddle across your side of the court to deflect the ball over the net into your opponent's half.

The 2 player game is played on one device with both players on the same screen at the same time - at a full 60 frames per second! You can choose the speed of the 2 player game from the pedestrian 'slow' to the insane 'ultra-fast'. 

Your paddle is curved so you can direct the ball over the net and you score goals by getting the ball to hit the floor in your opponent's side. You can bounce the ball off the back-wall or net and you have unlimited touches in your own half - just don't score an own goal!

The single-player game has a World Record for the highest level that's been won - see if you can match it or even beat it! As you progress through the levels the game speed increases and the computer player gets tougher to beat.

Everything is already unlocked so there are no in-App purchases or ads to bother you.

Tip: Accelerate into the ball for extra power.

Volotic is an experimental nonlinear sequencer by artist Scott Garner. What does that even mean? It means a fun way to create songs for everyone, with no musical experience required.In Volotic, you compose a song by arranging a selection of "towers" on a grid. Each tower has a different function for creating beats, modifying beats or triggering instruments.Here are some points with bullets next to them:• Over fifty tower types with more on the way.• A selection of demo compositions to get you started.• No musical experience is required, preset scales and arpeggios keep things sounding nice.• Manual tuning for advanced control.• 3D sound—drag your music to focus on different sections.• Easily record and share your composition with Everyplay.• Tons of new towers and handy features in Plus Mode.Volotic was selected for inclusion in the App Store Best of 2015. Neat!

Volt - Battery on the loose

You were on the way to a recycling process when fortunately for you - but not for the environment - you accidentally ran off.

Now your goal is to escape from the facility, which is an extremely difficult task due to the fact that you are a battery without legs. Equipped with a limited number of electric beams, you can connect to walls, move or destroy objects, turn switches, and charge generators. 
You also have the ability to jump or push off the walls - the rest is up to physics and gravity.

Key features:
- puzzle platformer with a lot of explosions
- over 60 levels divided into 4 industrial-themed zones
- boss stages
- unlockable 12-bit levels
- unlockable batteries

Vocamemory Kids (Vome Kids) là game giáo dục cung cấp một giải pháp học tiếng Anh mới nhằm góp phần giải quyết vấn đề học từ vựng một cách nhàm chán của trẻ em. Game được xây dựng dựa trên trò chơi “Đố chữ” truyền thống, nhằm tận dụng khả năng tương tác giữa hai hoặc nhóm người học với nhau, qua đó gia tăng hiệu quả của việc học từ vựng tiếng Anh.
Với mong muốn giúp các bé hứng thú hơn với việc học từ, nội dung của game được xây dựng dựa trên bộ từ vựng gần gũi, thân thiện, tương thích với các giáo trình tiếng Anh hiện đại, cùng các hình ảnh minh họa trực quan, sinh động, dễ hiểu nhằm giúp các bé:
-	Vừa học vừa chơi
-	Cải thiện hiệu quả học từ nhờ môi trường học tương tác (giữa các bé với nhau, giữa bố mẹ và con, giữa cô giáo và học sinh, …)
-	Tự đánh giá quá trình học từ vựng dựa trên kết quả chơi game
Chúng tôi hy vọng phương pháp học tập mới này sẽ phần nào giúp các bé học từ một cách hiệu quả hơn, thú vị hơn, và sáng tạo hơn. 

Một số đặc điểm của Vome Kids:
- Vome Kids hoàn toàn miễn phí
- Không yêu cầu kết nối với mạng Internet để sử dụng
- Luật chơi đơn giản, dễ hiểu
- Thích hợp cho mọi đối tượng có nhu cầu cải thiện vốn từ vựng
- Chỉ vui khi chơi cùng bạn bè, người thân

Sự ủng hộ và ý kiến đóng góp của các bạn chính là nguồn động viên to lớn để chúng tôi tiếp tục hoàn thiện sản phẩm trong tương lai. Chúng tôi hi vọng các bạn sẽ có được những trải nghiệm tuyệt vời cùng bé khi sử dụng Vocamemory Kids. Vui lòng chia sẻ trải nghiệm của bạn với Vome Kids tại https://goo.gl/forms/rzFbE0j7qo2TG8P03
Mọi thắc mắc và góp ý vui lòng liên hệ qua email support@vocamemory.com.

Vocamemory Kids (Vome Kids) is an educational game, which offers a modern and scientific way to learn English vocabulary. Vome Kids is built based on Vietnamese traditional game called “Charade” in order to use the interaction among players to improve the efficiency of learning English.
In order to make players feel more comfortable and interested in learning vocabulary, Vome Kids is made up from dictionary of words which are visual and understandable for kids. 

A visual and understandable English dictionary is used in order to make players:
- Feel more comfortable and interested
- Improve proficiency by interactive learning environment
- Self-evaluate learning progress
- More fun when playing with relatives, friends
With Vome Kids, we hope that learning vocabulary is no longer a big deal for not only kids, but also new learners. Your feedback would result in better Vome Kids, so that please share with us your experience with Vome Kids at https://goo.gl/forms/xm3yHZnKmevquqJA3. We wish you enjoy playing Vome Kids with your children, friends, colleagues,... 
Thank you in advance for supporting us.

Large format Wimmelfun

From then on, the direction is clear: it goes down, down to the depths of the ocean. [All] what can be discovered there between the universe and the seabed small Wimmelbook fans can find out on excitingly designed pages.
 
Haywire
In space something is going on
There is quite a lot of activity going on in space: The flying space stations, where UFOs, robots and people shake hands and even footballs fly through the blue sky. At the bottom of the page an airplane flies just above mountain peaks, which can then be admired on the next page in all their glory. Continue down the valley, along the river. To the coast and then deep down to the bottom of the sea.

Vooball is a flappy game but it's also a crazy fun color matching skill game that will test your reaction time and reflexes! How to play: * Tap your dot and navigate your way through the designated color in which your dot is! * Each time you pass through an obstacle, you earn one point and your dot will switch colors once you successfully pass through the obstacle. * No place for mistake: if your dotz touch a different color: GAME OVER! * Play for hours to improve reaction time and reflexes :)

A secret experiment has gone wrong and got out of control. A highly infectious virus has started to spread over the earth. People start to mutate into nightmare creatures, bite and kill each other’s. This must be stopped, and you and your sniper rifle have been chosen for this mission. As a retired military veteran it’s your duty to become the hero of this cause. Zoom your scope, adjust your sight and pull the trigger when you are ready. Voodoo Zombie Headhunter is here and it’s your turn.

Think of the best way to exterminate this threat. A headshot is always a good choice, rip-off their limbs, throw them to the air, destroy those putrefied corpses with original a unique cinematics. Bring death to the dead and survive in this Z world!

Discover news and stories, Give your Opinion, Predict what others think and Win tangible Rewards (Prize money, Gift Cards, or other Special Awards).

You will regularly receive quizzes that you can play. Each quiz will be open for a limited time. Playing a quiz is done in two steps:

Step 1:  You express your opinion on a topic (or a question) by choosing one of several options.

Step 2:  You try to estimate the percentage of users who chose a particular option at the previous step. 
It is this estimation that will determine your score, the more accurate it is, the more points you will get on the Quiz Score.

Challenges are regularly launched:
A Challenge includes several Quizzes. Quizzes' scores add up to form the Challenge Score.
For each Challenge, there is a goal to reach to be among the Winners. (e.g., to be ranked in the Top 10)

Winners of a challenge will get awards that depend on their ranking. Awards can be real money or a gift card.

What do you get by using Voolpo:

1. Discover news, stories, and high quality content

2. Give your opinion. 

3. Enhance your skills in understanding the crowd and reading others.

4. Win prize money and gifts

Voracity is a simple puzzle game. Try to get the highest score by eating the most numbers on the board. Think of it as a turn-based "snake" where you try to consume the entire board, but you will need to look several moves ahead to get a decent score. column1: Vote & Play President United States / USA 2k16 / 2016
column6:
This application was created to have fun while the 2016 USA election is happening.

You have the chance to support your favorite candidate by voting once per day, or even more, if you win or buy votes. Please enjoy our PresiJump and 2k16 games in the app, and you will have the chance to get more votes.

At the same time, to show your addiction to your favorite nominee, you can buy votes too. 

The votes of the candidates who will leave the debate will be transferred to the one(s) from the same party which will continue the competition. 

To help us in development, please rate our app through App Store or share it with your friends. 

Useful informations:

    As an introduction we would like to mention, that this application is only for game purpose.
        The votes in this application have only symbolic meaning.
        The results and statistics are only informal.
        The location data is used only to evaluate the geographical distribution of the votes.
        All the information will be used strictly confidentially, and never will be published to a third part.
        The votes of the candidates who will leave the debate will be transferred to the one(s) from the same party which will continue the competition.
        Your basic free vote quantity is once per day, and if it remains unused, will be not stored from one day to another.
        The votes won by playing or by buying will be stored until being used.
        If you uninstall the application, you will lose your unused votes.

Thank you for enjoying Play & Vote President 2k16 USA

Do you dream of being president, but your'e still just tapping cookies? The heroes of democracy welcome you! Become one of them in the exciting game Vote Blitz! Begin your political adventure with a tap!

A financial tycoon and communist, a democrat and dictator, or a woman from a distant land shrouded in magic - 18 unique characters need your help in a frenzied political race that will challenge your fingers. You'll never get bored with this arcade-style game! The game has begun!

It's as though the heroes of democracy have stepped out of the world of real politics. They might remind you of Trump, Putin, Kin Jong-un, or other famous people you know, but keep in mind that any similarities are purely coincidental! That kind of stuff happens in idle games.

Dive into a political adventure, go down the rabbit hole, and grope the underbelly of democracy! This clicker will give you amazing countries, and you'll have a chance to prove yourself in all of them and become a hero who will lead your people to prosperity! Or, if you've ever dreamed of being a terrifying dictator, seize power by force and hold an entire country in the palm of your hand! Your mom is nuts about this arcade-style game, you know.
100 unique levels will keep you engaged and make you tap like you've never tapped before! What'll it be: 10, 20, 50, or 300 taps per minute? It's time to stretch your fingers and prove that you're the faster, most agile tapper in this political game.
Every country has its own characters: a dictator, a lazy tycoon, a democrat, a communist, and more! All of them are worthy to become president! Choose one of them and help them assume power and honor among their fellow citizens! Want your hero to win an election in every country and conquer half the world? Now's your chance! Take part in a political clash and prove that you can seize power and become the leader, then change your citizenship
and fight for new democratic horizons! The clicker Vote Blitz! lets you do just that! Look, your mom's friend's son is already posting screenshots from this arcade-style game.
No political battle can be fair. Every dictator know that. It's true in real politics, to say nothing about the game. The clicker Vote Blitz! will give you boosters to increase your chances of winning! You can stop time to regain your strength and tap some cookies. Boosters give you the ability to bribe voters and get rid of those who want to see another character get elected.

The game genre known as "idle games" will really suck you in. If you're lucky you can find a suitcase with a surprise in it that will give you political power and bring you closer to your desired goal. It doesn't matter who your character is: the people's darling or a dictator who holds their country in an iron fist. There's a suitcase for all of them.
Your voters' votes can be used for more than just counting - you can spend them to get boosters, unlock new characters, or change your president's citizenship! If there's a little dictator inside of you, changing citizenship could really come in handy - why rule one country when you can rule the world? Value the votes you get - they'll help you win this political game and become a true hero of democracy!
Delete all the new games from 2018, set your cookie-clicker aside, down with lazy tycoons, forget about "tap tap tap" idle games. Arcade-style games and clickers quake before Vote Blitz! It truly is the most finger-pounding game of 2018.

ATTENTION! You can download and play Vote Blitz! for free, but certain in-game items can be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this function, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Please keep in mind that, in accordance with the User Agreement, only users who are four or older can download and play Vote Blitz! Please also note that our everyday game Vote Blitz does not collect users' personal data because we already know everything about you. Just kidding! We actually value your privacy.

Voteworthy is a leading Political Trivia quiz game! We have hundreds of quizzes available for the American political junkies – play, get entertained, challenge your opponents and make a place for yourself at the game leaderboard.

Play this fun political quiz for free and answer questions related to political news, views, labels and candidates - their promises and policies, current affairs, government, blunders/ gaffes, US Presidential Election, interesting anecdotes about Presidents and their first ladies, American political history, and many more issues in the political spectrum that would interest you.

You can also invite your friends and fellow political junkies – Democrats, Republicans, Libertarian or Independents, to play this stimulating game and challenge them to beat your score. Use lifelines for a leg-up, boost your ranking and win a coveted place at the VoteWorthy leaderboard while competing with people who share your passion and awareness in the US Political Scenario.

How to Play VoteWorthy?

Trivia Quiz
•    Choose the quiz from the home screen of the Voteworthy app.
•    Answer the questions – correct answers will get you a place on leaderboard, while the wrong answers will lead to negative markings.
•    Lifelines like 50/50 and crowd selections will help you beat your opponent.
•    Play alone or with friends and like-minded people.

Why to Play Voteworthy?

The whole world is inbounds. Votograph is mobile social gaming with your camera… dangerous.

One image gives us pause. One image tells a whole story. One image strikes chord with your group for a *GASP*, or a good laugh, or a thought provoking “hmmmm.”

Votograph is a first of its kind mobile social game. Users create and respond to challenges posed in their groups by taking a picture. 

A challenge is a word or simple phrase. Group members respond to a challenge by taking a picture that they feel best illustrates the challenge phrase. 

Group members who submit a challenge entry vote on the best image for that challenge. Winners collect achievements and get bragging rights.

Start with one of the public challenges in a public group. Create your own groups - with family, at work, and amongst friends. 

(Please remember to consider your group members before submitting images some may find offensive. Votograph promotes only ethically obtained photography.)

Votre couple est-il parti pour les noces de chênes... ou les noces de coton ? Résistera-t-il à l'épreuve du temps et du quotidien ?

Ce test, qui comporte deux versions (hommes et femmes) est basé sur vos réactions dans 20 situations de la vie courante vous permet de dessiner concrètement si votre couple est parti pour durer ou si au contraire il est voué à l’échec. Il vous aidera à mieux vous connaître en déterminant trois éléments-clés de votre comportement par rapport à votre couple

Le test qui suit se compose de 20 questions à choix multiples. Il n'est pas chronométré. En répondant à ces questions avec sincérité, vous allez révéler si votre couple est parti pour durer. A l'issue du test, vous bénéficierez d'une analyse pertinente sur les principaux traits qui vous caractérisent par rapport aux autres dans ce domaine.

Ce qu’en pense les utilisateurs

J'ai fait passer le test à toute la famille et, en y participant en groupe, nous avons passé un moment assez rigolo. Merci pour ces moments de plaisir et pour la qualité du test.
- Pierre-Yves V. - Palaiseau

Depuis que j'ai mon nouvel iPhone, on peut dire que je suis devenue une fidèle de vos tests. J'en ai déjà chargé une bonne douzaine et je vous le confirme, je continuerai à l'avenir.
- Vanessa D. - Chatelet (B)

Bonne idée, tous ces tests pour mieux se connaître ! C'est vrai qu'ils sont assez bien faits pour savoir comment les autres nous voient.
- Bernard B. - Limoges

Votre test est plutôt sympa mais j'ai surtout aimé les contenus "bonus", car on y trouve pas mal de choses étonnantes. Je recommande votre appli à tout le monde.
- Louis M. – Boulogne-Billancourt

Les résultats du test me correspondent bien, ça m’a même étonné. Bravo. Franchement, je ne m'attendais pas à une telle précision en le téléchargeant. Vivement les prochains !
Audrey A. – Mézières

Ever wished you could move the letters around in Boggle? Ever been frustrated by taking turns in Scrabble, watching your opponent destroy your carefully curated play options? Do you love stealing from your friends?

Then you need to try Vowel Movements!

This game is a frenzied mashup of Boggle, Scrabble, and Anagrams. 

Your goal is to capture all of the consonant tiles on a 7x7 grid of randomly selected letter tiles. Captured tiles become locked in place, making the forming of words increasingly challenging for you and any opponents.

Simple, easy to learn gameplay. Move tiles. Make words. Lock consonant tiles. Lock all of the consonant tiles to win. Advance to new levels of difficulty to keep your challenge fresh. Think the game is easy at Novice rank requiring only three-letter words? Wait 'til you see the higher rankings!

Vowel and special double-letter tiles can always be moved. Captured consonant tiles can only be moved again if they are used to make a new word. But be quick about it! You've only got a few seconds to move them around. 

Once you've made a word in a game you can't make it again in that game. Remember this rule when trying to use up those pesky Q-tiles!

So get started! Play by yourself in a relaxed "free play" mode. Play in a real-time match against up to three of your GameCenter friends. Play in a "time trial" against up to three computer players. Whichever way you play, you're bound to have fun!

Download now!

Learn Long and Short Vowel Sounds with Vowel Sounds Song and Game™ - The fun, easy way to teach long and short vowel sounds! 

The Vowel Sounds Song and Game™ app uses our very popular Vowel Sounds Song™ to teach long and short vowel sounds. The first game uses the song to teach students long and short vowel sounds by identifying the words in the song that use each vowel sound. The next four games help students master long and short vowel sounds by identifying each vowel sound in words not found in the song. These games are simple and fun, making them the easiest way to teach vowel sounds.

Grades: Preschool, Prekindergarten, Kindergarten, 1st Grade, and 2nd Grade

*This app is strictly educational and is ad-free and has no in-app purchases.  This is a free version with limited functionality so you can try before you buy the full app.

This is a ScribbleUp tool for helping emerging readers learn how to read, where they can practice tricky concepts about letters and sounds. It has been used successfully in classrooms and in reading programs with tutors.

The learning goal is for early readers to explore short vowels versus Vowel Teams, and learn the differences between them. This increases phonemic awareness and phonics skills. Make sure to say the word while you do it, or whisper it. If you can't say or whisper where you are, think it in your head. 

When all the words are sorted or made, you can check your answers by hitting the "Check Answers" button that automatically appears. Before you check answers with the button, check them yourself by clicking on all of the sounds and words.

This purposely does not have all of the answers embedded in the feedback, as the app is designed for guided and exploratory learning rather than relying on the app to give all of the answers.


      more

It avoids the exploding stars, flashing lights, to provide a simple, yet challenging workout for your brain.

How To Play:
- You are shown a word with only the vowels
- Swipe the consonants in the grid to fill in the blanks and form a word
- You can swipe forwards or backwards, horizontally or vertically, and even diagonally to 
find the answer
- If you get stuck on a word, use the arrows next to the clues to move to the next word
- Find the consonants for all the clues to finish the level

Features:
> No ads
> No in app purchases
> Unlimited levels
> We use the top 10000 most used words in the English language to build the puzzles, but you can use any of the top 333,000 words to solve
> Simple design that is easy on the mind.

Introducing VOXEL LITE,  the fun block-building app from the maker of HEADSPACE.  

Voxel Lite is a fun, easy-to-use 3D-pixel editor. It's like Minecraft without all the mining.  Use it to create simple sculptures, 3D icons, game-levels, or just to doodle with blocks. 

Voxel Lite is easy enough for kids to enjoy, but it is also designed for creative adults.  

Now Voxel and Voxel Lite offer Sculpteo 3D printing of your models!
Check out the stop motion made by printing 8 frames of a voxel animation:
http://www.flatblackfilms.com/Voxel

Simply tap in empty space to create the first block.  From there you can attach new blocks to it by tapping any face.  Or, toggle the grid guide to put blocks exactly where you want them.  A color palette lets you change colors.  Drag your finger on the selected block to rotate your view.  Use a two-finger-swipe to rotate the view as well.  Use the familiar two-finger pinch motion to zoom in or out -- or just hold your finger in one spot.

**This LITE version does not allow saving and loading of multiple files.  However, you can easily send your Voxel Lite model to the full version.  Voxel (the full version) offers advanced layering and animation tools.  You can also upload your models to the online gallery and share your creations with the world.

Use your voice to make things slide into Voxpix. You can lure lions, cars and carrots into the screen. Say “baaa” or “meee” and a cow or an ape lands in a green landscape. With Molliox you control what happens with your voice instead of your fingers.

Voxpix is developed for children with cochlear implant, speech impairments and children who need to practice their voice. But all children who want to play with their voice can have fun with Voxpix. 

Voxpix is an app for iPad made for voice training. The app has a microphone that hears sound. The child makes a sound and things like dogs or books appear on the screen. The connection between cause and effect can motivate children to make sounds. It is up to you as a therapist or parent to choose what sounds you want to practice: real words, nonsense words or speech sounds.  Maybe the child can make any kind of sounds in a free play?

The game has two difficulty levels.

- Who can practice -

● Children with cochlear implant
● Children with speech impairments
● Therapists and pre-school teachers who need a tool in their profession
● Parents who want to practice together with their children

- How to practice -

● Choose an environment that is as quiet as possible and put the iPad in front of you preferably on a table for the best result.
● Press the microphone image in the top right corner to turn the mike on. The mike turns green. Check where the real mike is on the iPad and make sure you don't cover it with your hand.
● Say something, like "beee" or "maaa", and an item slides in. Prepare in advance what kind of sounds you want to practice: real words, nonsense words or speech sounds.  If "p" isn't working, try "paaa".
● Press the microphone each time you make sounds. If you want to give the child an instruction while the mike is on, just turn it off temporarily, by pressing the image of the mike.
● The exercise is finished when the lamb starts celebrating. Then you can either press the play button in the top left corner to start the next exercise or you can play with the items on the screen, just drag and drop with your finger.

- Voxpix is childproof -

The app Voxpix has no advertising and no in-app purchases. There are parental locks to settings and help. Links to the web has parental locks.

Voxpix does not:
● Store sound files
● Transmit data about the user
● Require users to share personal information
● Ask for date of birth
● Collect, transmit, or have the capability to share personal information

App para o controle do traço de sonoridade. Pode ser utilizado com os sons fricativos anteriores, “f” e “v”, mediais, “s” e “z”, ou posteriores, “ch” e “j”.

O jogador deve controlar os movimentos do carro, por meio da produção de sons surdos e sonoros. Ao emitir e manter um som surdo, o carro vai para a esquerda, e ao emitir seu correspondente sonoro, para a direita.


Você pode configurar:
- Frequência Vocal Mínima e Máxima
- Duração do Jogo 
 
Objetivo: 
- Controle do traço de sonoridade.Trabalho com sons surdos e sonoros.

 
Principais vantagens:
- Concepção e realização nacional, com assistência técnica e científica compatíveis com as necessidades do fonoaudiólogo brasileiro.
- Estratégias atrativas e estimulantes, com o uso de jogos de alta resolução, para facilitar o aprendizado e monitoramento do paciente.
- Interação lúdica para desenvolver habilidades de voz e fala, melhorando a comunicação.
- Feedback visual da produção da voz em tempo real, o que facilita o monitoramento auditivo da voz (o usuário vê o resultado da manipulação dos parâmetros vocais).

In this App, the player has to sustain his/her voice as close as possible to the frequency of a given sound cue, so that the Equilibrist reaches the next target platform. You must set the frequency range for male, female or children prior to starting the game. The game plays random frequency and duration stimuli.
 
You can set up:
- Minimum and maximum pitch
- Game duration
- Level of difficulty

-------------------------------------------------

- Control of maximum phonation time and pitch
- Visual Feedback for vocal frequency 
 

Coordination:
Dr. Mara Behlau, SLP pHD
Guilherme Peccoraro, SLP

Nesta App, o jogador ouvirá um som e deve manter sua voz na frequência mais próxima a ele, com longa duração, para o equilibrista chegar até a plataforma alvo. As emissões do jogo apresentam frequência e a duração casuais, dentro da faixa pré-configurada para homem, mulher ou criança.
 
Você pode configurar:
- Níveis de dificuldade 
- Frequência Vocal Mínima e Máxima
- Duração do Jogo 
 
Objetivos: 
- Controle do tempo máximo de fonação e frequência
- Feedback visual para frequencia vocal
 
Principais vantagens:
- Concepção e realização nacional, com assistência técnica e científica compatíveis com as necessidades do fonoaudiólogo brasileiro.
- Estratégias atrativas e estimulantes, com o uso de jogos de alta resolução, para facilitar o aprendizado e monitoramento do paciente.
- Interação lúdica para desenvolver habilidades de voz e fala, melhorando a comunicação.
- Feedback visual da produção da voz em tempo real, o que facilita o monitoramento auditivo da voz (o usuário vê o resultado da manipulação dos parâmetros vocais).

Principais Aplicações Clínicas:
- Estimulação de voz e fala
- Condicionamento vocal

Voxy is the world’s first personalized language learning app that adapts to students’ and employees’ unique learning needs in real-time. Join over 3 million learners in more than 21 countries and discover how our efficient methodology and powerful technology will change the way you learn English.Working with English-speaking clients? Preparing for the TOEFL? Traveling soon? Voxy works on your computer, tablet and smartphone. Your course will be synched and up to date across all of these devices.How it WorksRather than teaching phrases that are not relevant to our learner’s needs like “Janie kicks the ball”, we deliver real English content that is updated daily. Journey and dance with the Nutcracker is the second part of a collection of two independent applications dedicated to the Nutcracker. The first application "The real story of the Nutcracker" tells of the extraordinary fate of a young man called the Nutcracker, who was transformed into a pitiful wooden man by the Mouse King thirsting for revenge. 

The second part "Journey and dance with the Nutcracker"  immerses us in the dream of a feverish young girl falling in and out of consciousness, who gradually falls in love with her toy, the Nutcracker. As she sleeps, she roams through wondrous worlds and her growing love imbues an increasingly human form on her toy. Just like the first volume of the tale, this app offers an interactive journey.

Sonic Solveig has created a musical app featuring the interactive tale of the Nutcracker, as well as musical games,  music to the Nutcracker ballet and interesting facts about this great literary and musical classic.

For children aged 6 and upwards 

The app's main features: 

• A story-telling mode. By keeping your finger on the screen, the story and music scroll at the desired pace.
• Interactive frames  interspersed throughout the story. These let you recreate sounds and melodies, allowing you to carry on with the story. 
• A game zone (music, image and sound-based memory games, musical jigsaws, educational games based on instruments in a symphony orchestra)
• Illuminating information about the musical and the literary work in anecdotal form: the invention of the celesta, the relationship between the living and the mechanical …
• A selection of the best Nutcracker ballet tracks in digital format, allowing you to scratch the record as it plays. You can enjoy the magnificent, renowned performance by the London Symphony Orchestra, conducted by Antal Dorati

If you've enjoyed the app, leave us a comment and let us know!
If you've experienced any problems moving through the game, please send us a quick email to contact(@)sonicsolveig.com before leaving a comment!
