Le professeur Sangène ne sait plus où donner de la tête. Aujourd’hui, il y a trop de malades à diagnostiquer. Il a vraiment besoin de l’aide d’Eugène, son assistant microscopique, pour partir à la découverte du fonctionnement d’une cellule du corps et en comprendre ses mécanismes. A l’aide de cette application, découvre le mystère de la vie en pénétrant à l’intérieur d’une cellule surdimensionnée appartenant à un des patients du professeur et tente de réparer une atteinte génétique avec les outils de la biomédecine moderne que pourra fournir le laboratoire.Cette application est pleinement exploitable en support de l’animation de la cellule géante, animation scientifique proposée par l’école de l’ADN à Généthon. Contact : ecole-adn@genethon.fr  01-69-47-11-75Financement : Cette application a été réalisée grâce aux recettes du Téléthon et au soutien du Conseil départemental de l’Essonne et du Conseil régional d’Ile de France.Crédits images : Miko Kontente, Licence creative commonCrédits photos : AFM-Téléthon, Christophe HargouesCrédits films : Vincent Basso-Bondini, Cortex Productions (Andreas Koch)Crédits technique : Furet Company

column1: Voyage dans le corps humain - Un jeu Science et Vie Junior
column6:
Relevez le défi que vous propose Science et Vie Junior et traversez 7 parties du corps humain !

Quel est le point commun entre un corps humain et un croiseur interstellaire de science-fiction ?
Tous deux sont des vaisseaux ultra-perfectionnés, conçus pour se mouvoir dans un milieu hostile. 

Eh oui, votre corps, lui aussi, compte une multitude de coursives, une passerelle de commandement, des systèmes de défense et de propulsion… Et vous êtes des veinards : nous avons dégoté un membre d’équipage qui a accepté de vous faire visiter cette prodigieuse machine. À condition que vous sachiez répondre à toutes ses questions, évidemment !

A vous de jouer !

Download Voyages and play them in the actual environment, by following the provided route to places where you will encounter challenges, relating to what that place was like and what lived there many millions of years ago.

The challenges involve answering task questions for which you obtain a score. The answers to the tasks are to be found both in what you find at the task sites and in the information provided by the app. This information is provided as reconstructions of what scientists think a place was like long ago, plus the life forms that may have existed there, the weather conditions and the ancient geography of the planet at the ti.

In addition to answering the tasks, you receive unpredictable virtual threats, that you have to answer against the clock or suffer a significant penalty. For your Voyage you have supplies of water, oxygen and fuel. Your virtual water and oxygen supplies will be steadily drained based on the rock you are traveling over and the climate and composition of the atmosphere at the time that rock was formed. Your fuel level is based on the battery level of your device. Your final Voyage score is based on many factors, including the level of your supplies when you complete the Voyage with and whether you have attempted to cheat in any way.

The app and its Voyages could be used in this educational game playing style, or be used to explore the geology of a Voyage area. Normally tasks can only be answered by actually being within the task zone (geofence), but it is possible to work out a code to unlock a Voyage so it may be undertaken anywhere - except you will never obtain a score as high as that for actually going to the places.

Each Voyage is supported by a map, with task sites and basic safety and amenity information, along with photos, diagrams, audio video and animation.

The app comes with one built-in 'demo' Voyage which is unlocked by default. Other Voyages, as they become available, can be downloaded over the cellular network or WiFi. You can always delete these Voyages when you are done with them. When using the app out on a Voyage you do not require cellular (phone) or WiFi connectivity. The app does require GPS to determine your location when doing a Voyage for real, but for no other purpose.

Do you remember the Digi-Devices of the 90's? VPET is a welcomed throw back to a forgotten era. 

Just like these devices you'll need to raise, care, train, clean and feed your VPET so it can grow into even stronger creatures.

Features:
- Start out with one VPET to Evolve (In-App Purchase more)
- Feed and train your VPET so it can get stronger!
- Use the battle system which allows 2 VPETS to battle over Bluetooth

As the VPET grows it will evolve according to how the player has treated it. From this emerge even stronger, more enduring and more powerful VPETS.

*Note*
The app was created to provide a retro simulation of the classic digital monsters gameplay but it is NOT Digimon and is NOT licensed/endorsed by Bandai. All the virtual pets appearing in VPET Gen1 Free were created by Overdose Media.

VPoker contains two casino-style video poker games with a 'Double or Nothing' bonus round. 

Choose either 'Jacks or Better' or 'Deuces Wild'.  You will be dealt five cards using random ‘serial dealing’.  Keep the cards that you think will help you get that winning hand.  

For every winning hand a ‘Double or Nothing’ bonus round is offered (if enabled in settings).  During the bonus round you must draw a higher ranked card than the dealer's to win.  There is a limit of 4 wins per bonus round  and a 'Push' counts as a win. 

VPoker is a fast game, perfect for your commute.  If you enjoy playing video poker, this is the app for you!

VPoker is not designed for real money gambling, rather it is a casino-style entertainment app intended for an adult audience.

    KEY FEATURES
• Pay once to Install and Play
• Free bank credits, you select the amount
• There are NO ADS and NO In-App Purchases
• New games and updates included, no additional cost
• Does NOT collect personally identifiable information
• Beautiful games with large easy to view cards
• Dark background compliments Dark Mode
• Multiple user configurable options (in Settings)

    USER INTERFACE
• Intuitive tap and swipe user interface
• Tap paytable amount column to change credits bet
• Tap paytable winning hands to change game
• Tap prompt or swipe right for Deal, Draw, Stand, YES
• Tap prompt or swipe left for NO
• Tap cards to alternately hold or cancel hold
• Tap the blue diamond for settings
• Tap the blue ‘?’ for help

    CONFIGURABLE OPTIONS INCLUDE
• Reload bank credits at any time between games
• Auto replenish bank credits when balance is low
• Enable 'Double or Nothing' bonus game
• Enable auto hold winning hand when dealt
• Enable Indication of winning hand when dealt
• Enable game event sounds
• Enable realistic casino background sounds
• Disable card animations for faster game play
• Disable winning animations

   DISCLAIMER
VPoker does NOT offer ‘real money gambling’ or an opportunity to win real money or prizes.  Practice or success with this app does NOT imply future success at ‘real money gambling.’

Vpop Piano Line combines fast-paced gameplay with a Vpop songs to create an experience like no other. Featuring beautiful piano world of increasing difficulty, each one paints a unique song. The key of control music line is to not only watch for obstacles and traps, but also hear and play to the music. Listen to the melody of piano, and after a short while you will find yourself doing better and better. Make the line dancing and speed your finger.
Come on! Test your reflexes and rhythm skills! See the surprises and wonders every level brings to you.

No special skills needed for Vpop Piano Line, all this game asks of you is an attentive mind and fast finger! Touch and touch and here you go.
Vpop Piano Line features:

1.Vpop songs top 100 and more than 1000+ hot piano songs and update daily
2.Very simple  to play with only one finger tap
3.Music is the key to guide you : 100% hit soundtrack
4.Three level suited for you : easy, normal, hard. Dare you pass 80% with HARD mode?
5.Enjoy a brand-new level of sound quality. Best when use headphone.
6.Endless level with increasing speed of line and rhythm. How far you can go?

Game rules:
Guide an ever-growing Piano Line through piano environment, listening carefully to the music. Tap the screen to make a turn, avoiding obstacles and run to the end of song.You will get 3 stars when reach 100% of song. If you die, don't worry, watch video to revival and continue reach the end of game.
Get two star to unlock one new song, three star to unlock two new song or just simple watch video to unlock new songs!

DISCLAIMER:
Vpop Piano Line is an unofficial fan application. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by Vpop , their management, or record label.

This app does not include any copyrighted material.
The piano melodies are arranged with individual piano notes
This app is for entertainment purposes only.

FEEDBACK:
Feel free to email us song requests, issues, comments, and suggestions, with your comments and support, we can add more songs and make better games!

NOTE: This version of FonoMix 1 is intended for schools looking to purchase the application. VPP FonoMix 1 was designed for organizations looking to avail the app for their teachers and students. Unlike the 'original' version, VPP FonoMix 1 has no in-app purchases and includes a one-year access to the lessons and games. 

If you are an individual looking to buy and download the application, please search the App Store for the original FonoMix 1 app.

----------

FonoMix "Learn to read 1" ‐ the first start for learning to read

The app FonoMix "Learn to read 1" ‐ based on literacy learning according to FonoMix Munmetoden that has strong foundation in current research in language development and reading and has shown very positive results in scientific studies. The method was first published in 2006.

The app teaches the student in a simple and understandable way to use the speech sounds/mouths o s l a r m (six sounds). The app shows that words are made up of "blocks" /sounds and gives the child a way both to make words ("write") and to "read" words ‐ using the six sounds/mouths (a total of 15 words). 

Audience: Age 4‐5 in preschool or at home, and also students of all ages who need sound training and the very first foundation in learning to read (special‐ and also adult education). 

The app FonoMix "Learn to read 1": 

• is entertaining and fun thanks to the many senses that are activated 
• have a structured, multi‐sensory approach 
• has only 6 sounds (o s l a r m) so that everyone will succeed to automate these sounds and quickly understand the reading code 
• shows the language sounds (phonemes) with images of mouths to make sounds visible and thus easier to understand, remember, and produce
• consolidates the sounds in memory by names that tell the student how the sound is made in the mouth, for example Tandväsaren (s) and these names are used parallel with the sound 
• functionally independent but there are great benefits if the student also can experiment with FonoMix concrete prereading‐set "Playing with Speech Sounds" ("Leka med Pratljud")
• is suitable for students with different language backgrounds other than Swedish (Sva, Sfi) who will start to learn to read

----------

FonoMix "Learn to read 2" 

The app FonoMix "Learn to read 2" ‐ based on literacy learning according to FonoMix Munmetoden, which has strong foundation in current research in language development and reading and has shown very positive results in scientific studies. The method was first published in 2006.

The app teaches the student in a simple and easily comprehensible way with six speech‐sounds and their letters (o s l a r m). The six sounds/mouths link to their letters and the student make/"write" and read 15 words.

Audience: 6‐year‐olds in preschool or at home, and all students, regardless of age, who are in need of a sure way to start to read and write (i.e. special– and adult education). 

The app FonoMix "Learn to read 2":

• is entertaining and fun thanks to the many senses activated 
• have a structured, multi‐sensory approach 
• includes 6 speech‐sounds (o s l a r m) and 6 letters, which means that everyone can succeed to get started reading 
• have mouths that show the sounds and make sounds visible and therefore easier to recognize, pronounce, and remember 
• consolidates the sounds in memory by name that speaks of how the sound is made in the mouth, for example Tandväsaren (s), used parallel with the sound 
• practice the important automation of coupling sound‐letter and letter‐sound
• functionally independent but there are great benefits if the student also can experiment with the FonoMix kit for preschool (F‐klass‐sats) 
• is suitable for students with other language background other than Swedish (Sva, Sfi) who want to learn to read from start

column6:
•	Live Feed
A news feed featuring the latest content for your virtual reality headset; this content can be a VR game, an experience, a 360 video or an article again. The Live Feed will be updated at least once a week, but can be updated on a daily basis depending on the news and content.

•	TOP 20 and the user vote
The VR Center Top 20 will be reviewed every week based on your votes; a ranking of applications and videos will be presented as a TOP 20 illustrated with icons indicating whether the content is up, down or stable compared to last week. The purpose of this vote is to help us and you find the best content in virtual reality. 

•	Apps and Videos categories
All the experiences offered in the VR Center are filed by category. The catalog will of course be extended during the beta phase and a premium set of the most popular content is also planned.
Are you a developer? Do not hesitate to submit your application to the following address: vrcenter@homido.com


•	Bookmarks
Located in the side menu, it allows to find all the experiences in the live feed as well as in the categories. Each application or a video card gives you the possibility to mark the content to find it later in this section, at any time.
By dragging an application card to the left, you can access this card or delete it from the Bookmarks page.

•	Dynamic search
You can start a dynamic search at any time by typing in the first three characters of the content you are looking for. The results will be displayed instantly in the form of cards, giving you access to the experiences.

•	Facebook Connect
To ensure that votes are counted and that no votes are doubled, the VR Center uses Facebook’s unique authentication. Only the email address is required for the sole purpose of identifying the user, no other information from your Facebook account is used.

•	Sharing through the VR Center
It allows us to notify an application or a 360 video to be added in the VR Center. This function is very simple to use: press the Share button and share through the VR Center. After testing or viewing, we may add the proposed content.

•	Expert mode 
A space reserved for those who are familiar with more complex applications, technical articles and exclusive tutorials.

VR Center is compatible with all virtual reality headsets for smartphones including:

Homido, Durovis Dive, Freefly VR, Merge VR, Gear VR (via tips), VR Box, Shinecon, Dodo case, Daydream View, Dlodlo, VR One, Cardboard, Noon VR, Bobo VR etc.

All of the brand names or product names used are the registered marks of their respective owners.

Experience an unforgettable Christmas Holiday adventure in full immersive virtual reality! Relive those childhood moments of presents, cookies, and a warm fireplace!

Music: Jingle Bells (Steviie Wonder & Keanu Trap Remix)

This is a little test world written by myself to play around with a Christmas world in mobile VR. I intend to build on it each year and make it a better and better experience. But for now I wanted to get something out there for everyone to enjoy.

So please, enjoy    : )

When you open the app it will go immediately into the North Pole. You can stay there as long as you like and look around. To select a door you will see a spinning Christmas Wreath when you look directly at it. Looking for 2 seconds will then select it.

The music volume can be controlled by looking down at the seat of the sleigh and pointing your eyes to either the music plus or music minus options.
When you are ready to go through a calendar door then look at the door you would like to go through. If the door number is greater than or equal to the day in December then you are able to enter. You will travel to that door and enter for a short time (10 to 20 seconds) before you are brought back to the North Pole.
 
There is a reset button on the seat of the sleigh if you wanted to reset the game back to the North Pole at any time.

Your Mission:
Dropped at night in a bad weather at a secret enemy army camp near the Amazon Jungle border. Project assigned directly from the American GHQ is to enter enemy camp area, use map and clear small enemy unit that will try to protect the camp. Expect a great clash at each checkpoint, so show your strength to kill enemy soldiers, make hell on earth for them, and advance step by step and reach the centre point. Destroy all important enemy assets like Fuel and Ammunition dumps, target armor and military vehicles so as to break them. When you see the tank or military vehicles auto select RPG-7 and blast them. After that find and get hold a red box of classified enemy documents hidden somewhere in the camp. Finish with great care and find safe way to go as you might be attacked by enemy Gunship Helicopters. With limited ammo it’s a daring mission which only bravest Commando elite dare to accept. Show yourself like an iron man. Wish you all the good luck and waiting for good news.

Non VR Mode:

With VR Dion Park Tour: Real Jurassic Experience you can experience and explore the tremendous lost world dinosaur land by using VR glasses. Explore the dinosaur safari world and live with these dangerous predators and see how they hunt and attack one another. The numbers of deadly dangerous are living in this dark land. Just install this game and accomplish your dream to see the brutal war between dinosaurs. This is the best VR game to visit the dinosaur land. VR Dion Park Tour: Real Jurassic Experience  trivia game of dinosaurs with full of thrill, adventure and action. This can amaze you because of its realistic graphics. 
In VR Dion Park Tour: Real Jurassic Experience explore all the different dinosaur species: Apatosaurus, Pteranodon, Spinosaurus, Stegosaurus, Triceratops, Velociraptor and many more. This is a fun family safari park dinosaur ride for all with unlimited excitement and thrill!

You have been invaded by Doom Shrooms! How long can you survive against the Doom Shrooms? All you have is a banana gun to fend them away. Challenge yourself to survive against the Doom Shrooms! Beware of the Shroom Kings...

Features
- Different Power Ups to enhance your power
- Different Doom Shrooms with unique abilities
- Doom Shrooms become stronger as you survive longer
- Shroom Kings may appear if they deem you as a worthy enemy

If players are using mobile VR headset(with magnetic trigger), banana gun is fired with the magnetic trigger. 

If players are using mobile VR headset(without magnetic trigger), banana gun is fired with the shoot/enter button on Bluetooth controllers.

Compatibility
This VR app is optimized for the use of Google Cardboard. If you encounter any issues displaying this VR game, please check that Cardboard setting has been enabled for your device correctly. This is usually done by scanning the QR code of your headset to automatically enable the settings for your headset. If you still encounter any issues, please send us an email and we will do our best to assist you.

The Drag Race Reaction Trainer was created to help the novice drag racer to train and improve their reaction time at the starting line. Pro Tree and Sportsman Tree trainers are available with options to select daytime and nighttime scenes with the option to run the left or right lanes. Further settings are available to help increase the actual experience. This trainer features sounds and motions typical of the starting line that help simulate the various distractions and gain the attention required to cut a perfect light. The standard version is a great trainer that can easily be used anywhere at any time. For the full experience, the VR trainer will put you in the cockpit of the car to allow your senses to grow as if you were really at the starting line of a real race. This app is intuitive and easy for anyone to learn from.

Have you ever ridden a dragon? And how about killing your enemies while sitting on a dragon. So folks here are your chance. VR Flying Fiery Dragon is a Virtual Reality game, in which you will have your very own dragon. With people in packs are ready to hunt your dragon down with bows and arrows, you don’t have an easy task in your hand.  As your enemies are working on a sole purpose of killing your dragon, you cannot risk the safety of your dragon. Let your dragon to kill every single man on every step of the way, otherwise the mission will be considered as incomplete.  In VR Flying Fiery Dragon, Dragon is capable of controlling of itself; all you have to do is set the dragon in the proper direction, so the dragon can aim the target and shoot it with a fireball. This is the perfect game for Virtual Reality lovers.
VR Flying Fiery Dragon has four different exciting Environments, which include Mountain Forest, Snow, Desert and Dark Forest. Each level has a different environment, while a number of enemies in each level are different.  In the first environment, there are Mountain Forests. The Mountain Forests have lush green trees and big beautiful mountains which provide eye-catching sight in the first level of the game. The next one is the snow environment, in which Mountains are covered in snow and fog; it is another beautiful environment to fly your dragon.  While in the desert settings there are cactus plants and big dry rocks.  This environment is very tricky and fiery. With targets are hiding behind the rocks, it will take a test of your reflexes to the maximum level. The fourth environment is the Dark Forest. It is with the definitely increased level of difficulty this environment has big mountains and dark forests.  It is where, it get all dark and gloomy. 
It the fantasy game that offers a lot of fun and adventure. Spread the terror on the senses of your enemy with your amazing flying dragon. Kill all of your enemies, and don’t spare anyone of them. This powerful and terrifying dragon is a magical creature. This Dragon will run behind your enemies and will attack them with fireballs. VR Flying Fiery Dragon is one of the best combat strategy games, and you have to ensure the safety of your dragon, by adjusting the aim of the dragon in the right direction. We hope you will love VR Flying Fiery Dragon, as it provides you the ultimate experience of flying the dragon in the Virtual Reality environment. So get ready to ride on a dragon and face your enemies.  
    How to play:
•	Tilt to move the head of the Dragon from left to right.
•	Once you have found the target, keep the dragon in the proper direction 
•	When dragon will have the target in access, it will shoot the fireballs.
•	After killing the first target, the dragon will move to the next target. 
•	Your reflexes are very important, and you have to be super alert, otherwise your dragon will get killed.
Game Features:
•	Realistic environments. 
•	Multiple environments. 
•	Smooth control.
•	Amazing visual effects.
•	3D graphics. 
•	Brilliant flying dragon. 
•	Easy and free to play. 
•	Download and Enjoy your Flying Fiery Dragon.

For more queries you may contact through email: soloftech2017@gmail.com

VR Dungeon Maze Escape is a horror themed maze game for VR Cardboard glasses. The unique feature that our game offers, is a walk in place to move feature. This feature brings a new way of walking in virtual reality.
There are 9 different mazes to solve in 3 modes. Find a key mode and Timebomb mode are a little bit harder to complete, therefore we advise you to complete simple mode levels first.

A remote enemy base camp has been spotted at the north region of the city... 
As an elite Officer, you have been given a mission to clear the enemy base; but within the limited time period. 
You will be encountered by enemy soldiers at each checkpoint and you have to kill them and move step by step. 
The Mission assigned to you directly from the GHQ. 

Your Mission:
Your mission is to surround the enemy and kill. You will have limited amunation and will have limited time period.
Destroy all important enemy assets including Fuel and Ammunition dumps, military tanks & helicopters. 
You might be attacked by enemy Gunship Helicopters or encounter mines or booby traps. 
Shoot the target at will. 
Go & won the battle; wish you good luck... Soldier

How to Play:
- Touch & Drag the screen anywhere to move/rotate your gun left, right, up or down 
- Tap Fire button at bottom right to fire any selected weapon
- Select any weapon during action: Light Machine Gun, Pistol or RPG (Rocket Propelled Gun)
- For enemy at far distance, use the Telescope for sniper shoot
- The weapons will reload itself but keep an eye on the number of bullets ... You have limited ammunition.

Features:
- FPS (First Person Shooter)
- Complete Battlefield real looking 3D environment
- Amazing Movie Quality sound effects and sound track
- Easy GUI and controls
- Enemy AI
- Efficient weapon control and selection

Explore 6 worlds in 3D stereoscopic view cheaper than with an Oculus Rift or HTC Vive using a VR Google Cardboard kit compatible headset.

Look down during a few seconds or use the iOS fully supported magnet toggle on the side of the headset to start/stop moving into current scene or to load next level (4 configurable VR moving modes are possible with or without magnet toggle, speed, player's height or eyes distance is also configurable).

You can build a Google Cardboard VR headset yourself or buy one on a dedicated website. 
Learn more about Google Cardboard and building your own virtual reality glasses at g.co/cardboard.

VR Experience Free is also compatible with premium VR smartphone headsets such as Homido or Durovis Dive VR.
Note that the application also works on iPad but needs a dedicated VR headset.

In this free version you can explore 6 different levels/worlds  :
- Office
- Space ship
- Desert
- Forest
- Center of the Earth
- Ice land

English and French are supported.

16 additional more interactive levels are included in the full featured version (also available on the App Store).

For the best experience, use iPhone 5, 6 or 7 series.

Note: with virtual reality and 3D stereoscopic view, you may experience dizziness, or “Sim Sickness” if you are tired or using the game for too long a time. In that case stop playing immediately.

Let's enjoy running in the VR Sapporo City!
Burn off calories through running !

Do you want to workout anytime anywhere?
This APP will make your wishes come true! 

This APP is VR fitness application. You can enjoy running in the virtual Sapporo city.

* Walk around anywhere in VR Sapporo City.
* Enjoy 3D environment with Google Cardboard viewer.
* Move forward by stepping then and there..
* Calories burned calculator is supported and will displayed on screen.

Let's workout without hitting the Gym !

[How to start workout]
White little dot will be displayed on screen, when you started the application. Control the device and put the white little dot on the "START" button for few seconds. After few seconds exercise mode will be started.

[How to move forward]

You can move forward by stepping then and there.

Lift each leg alternatively at spot. App will catch the device up and down vibration and you will move forward accordingly.

[How to end workout]
Look down and you will find "BACK" button. Put the white little dot on the "BACK" button for few seconds.

[How to use with Google Cardboard viewer]
Control the device and put the white little dot on the "SETTING" button for few seconds. Then Menu will be displayed on screen. Tap the "VR Mode" menu to activate VR mode. Put Google CardBoard compatible goggles at your face.
Tap the "Enable "Unity-Chan"" menu to enable Unity-Chan.

[Note]
Please use this application at your own risk. We can not be held liable or responsible for any damages caused by using this application.

VR Flight Simulator is an arcade-game in which you can fly in a small plane above several beautiful landscapes in virtual reality.The following landscapes are available:-The Alps and Mt Blanc (France/Italy) -Guadeloupe (French Caribbean Island) -Kilimandjaro (Kenya) -Perito Moreno (Argentina) -Grand Canyon (USA) -Mt Cook mountains (New Zealand) -Ha Long bay (Vietnam) -Tahiti (French Pacific Island). The following elements are needed to pilot the aircraft in VR:- Google Cardboard compatible VR headset- Made For iPhone/iPad bluetooth gamepad (current version was tested with the Steelseries Nimbus gamepad available from Apple Store)

Enjoy one the best Virtual Reality experiences currently available for mobile devices!

• Feel what it's like flying inside the cockpit of a real aircraft, by simply using your smartphone.
• Interact with cockpit buttons, switches and levers.
• Push-back, taxi to runway, take-off, fly, land.


IMPORTANT NOTE: 
This app is compatible with all VR headsets suitable for mobile devices (such as cardboard or others).  You may have to scan the appropriate QR code that provides the best vision quality and adjustments for your headset. (Tap on the gear icon)


Main Features:
--------------
• 2 aircraft types : A320 and B737
• Day/Night
• Cockpit and wing-view cameras
• Realistic physics/aerodynamics
• Ground controls (steering, brakes, pushback)
• Flight controls (roll and pitch)


Cockpit interactions:
--------------------
• Start/shut down engines
• Control thrust amount
• Flaps
• Pushback
• Landing gear


Graphics :
----------
• High definition 3D cockpits
• Realistic airport environment (buildings, taxiways, parking area with jetways, runways)
• Realistic terrain
• Realistic airport runway and taxiway lights.


Locations:
-----------
• Athens
• Manchester
• More in next versions


Realistic sound effects :
---------------------------------
• ATC chatter
• Engine sound (spool up, reverse thrust, idle)
• Other sound effects
• GPWS callouts (during landing)


Cameras
----------------
• Cockpit 
• Wing view

---IMPORTANT---
iPhone 6S or better recommended.

column1: VR Flying Car Flight Simulator – The best game for google cardboard Virtual Reality
column6: Are you looking for the latest vr games for google cardboard or your virtual reality headset? VR Flying Car Flight Simulator is the first VR car game in flying cars category which brings you the most immersive vr flight simulator experience in virtual reality. Experience immersive virtual reality flight simulation through a colorful galactic landscapes. This flying car game is designed exclusively for Cardboard VR to offer the most immersive virtual reality experience.Move and look all around you while you take the flight -- you can see in front, behind, up and even down. Take a thrilling sky ride through the mountains, into the trees, clouds, roads in the fabulous dream of modern Virtual World. Look around to fly through and explore this vast and modern city surrounded by ocean. Use your VR headset button or simply tap the screen to reset the level. Destroy every wave, rush to the level boss, advance to new worlds and become the hero of the stars.How To Play:- Use VR headset to explore the universe in a 3D view.- There are three galaxies available to explore the different planets.- Perfect your lightsaber skills by taking on some of the most menacing villains the dark side has to offer, skillfully dodging and attacking enemies.- Target the galaxy by placing a red dot for a second and travel through hundreds of star systems.- Move your device and find the best angle to attack and destroy stars.Features:- Endless runner mode with a smooth and simple spaceship control system.- Discover unique challenges and explore various planets.- Test your skills and sharpen your mind as a military strategist.- Look at the enemies to shoot or look at the objects for interaction.- An amazing 3D environment is full of action with hundreds of enemies. - Experience frenetic combat with this VR space shooter.A galaxy on fire full of epic space battles needs a commander like you. VR Game Math is the first (Augmented Reality) ARKit based educational app of the world and the first Native ARKit game from Turkey.

Your mission on the game to solve the mathematical operation than catch the number you obtained as the result of the operation. You need to catch all the numbers by solving the operations. Of course it is not so easy. You have to find the desired number among the constantly flowing figures on the screen.

VR Game Math  wants you to capture the desired number within a certain period of time. During this process, you should find numbers by looking around  in the real world. Time you have is changing as the levels change. 

There are three different bonus balls to help you in the game and to keep the game flowing. These balls are used for different purposes.

The red bonus allows you to destroy the current target immediately.

The blue bonus balls allow the numbers on the screen to remain stationary for 5 seconds.

Green bonus balls are the only bonus that is related to the time period. If you do not have enough of them while capturing numbers, you can take extra time using this bonus.

With simple editing and uncomplicated screen structure, you will experience a different gaming experience. You will be able to improve your ability to perform mathematical operations by an enjoyable way

If you want to play with numbers and play a game that is different from the others, VR Game Math is exactly the game you are looking for.

When you start the game, the countdown begins.
During that countdown, please decide the direction to fly the golf ball.
When counting is over, the golf ball (yourself) flies swinging.
While the ball is flying, you can see the surrounding scenery.
Please feel the inside of the VR world constructed in 3D as a golf ball.

If you wear the head mounted display before starting playing,
Afterwards it is a simple game of shaking your head up and down and sideways.

Main operation)
- Menu screen
    - Align the white spot at the center of the screen with the button
    - When the countdown is over, you will have pressed the button
- Game
    - Hall cups are randomly determined for each game
        - The hall cup is represented by a red effect
    - Before the countdown finishes point the direction to fly the golf ball
        - When the countdown is over, you will jump in the direction the golf ball faces

menu)
- Score
    - Leaderboard
        - Compete with the world's users the shortest distance to the hall
    - Achievement
        - The rank is determined by the shortest distance to the hall

This VR Jurassic Dino Park World & Roller Coaster 360 Cartoon  game designed for smartphones, allows both you and your children to fully sink in the amazing world of dinosaurs and a prehistoric adventure. You just need to put on a virtual reality device like vr-box etc. to fully enjoy the wonderful experience of seeing dinosaurs in a first person. 

A virtual reality game for the entire family.

It is about dinosaurs. Yes, it is true that it is about dinosaurs and a theme park. However, in the movie heroes had to deal with bloodthirsty raptors and a t-rex who loves to eat layers. Dinosaurs which you can find in this game are among most tame creatures in a gaming history. It is a dino park simulator where your kids are not only going to have fun but also, learn a lot about these mighty creatures which once ruled the entire world. The best part of it though is the fact, that your children can simply use their own smartphones to access this wonderful world of adventure.

Key features:

-VR Jurassic Dino Park World & Roller Coaster 360 Cartoon is a virtual reality game in which, you visit dinosaurs from era of Jurassic. Go this park now.  
-Enjoy 18 different rollercoaster rides. During each one of them, dinosaurs are going to accompany you. 
-You don't need VR goggles to enjoy the game. 
-Enjoy the movie mode and learn the history of the island, dinosaurs and your own character.
-Use the free roam mode to observe dinosaurs in their own habitats. 

A 360 virtual reality experience with many things to do.

In order to make a game interesting, it has to provide players with something to do. It is the absolute basis of a proper entertainment. This dino world simulator game provides your children with a real, theme park like experience filled with joy and entertainment. 
First of all, there is a mode where the  child can jump into 18 different rollercoaster. Each one of them is going to take your child for a ride, during which he or she is going to be accompanied by different species of dinosaurs. Creatures like velociraptors, brachiosaurs, stegosaurs, triceratops or even a mighty t-rex can be seen up close from the first point of view. Remember though, that these animals are much bigger, stronger and more dangerous than any other species currently living on earth. This adventure certainly is not for scared one. For those of you who might want to know more, the rollercoaster rides which you can find here are the same like the ones which you can find in the realistic VR Jurassic. 

There is also a free roam mode. Here you can freely move around the park and watch dinosaurs which  live on the entire Jurassic island. These creatures are not blocked by any boundaries. Hence, you will be able to observe them in their own habitats. Learn about their behavior etc. You can walk with them and simply observe what they do. It can easily be compared to a big open zoo or a safari. Though, you should notice that in both zoo as well as on safari you cannot find dinosaurs. Only a virtual reality can provide you with such an experience. 

Another interesting thing which you can do in the game is to enjoy a so-called movie mode. Here you can watch various movies about the history of the island itself, as well as history of your own character. You wake up in the middle of a jungle and you have to do everything to survive, while being mesmerized by the beauty of it.

You don't need VR goggles to play!

Despite the fact, that this is a virtual reality roller coaster game you don't need the VR goggles at all to enjoy it. The game and all elements which you can find in it, can be easily played without the VR. It is still going to be enjoyable and fun for you and your children. In general VR Jurassic Dino Park World & Roller Coaster 360 Cartoon  is a game for everyone with a lot of an educational value about dinosaurs.

Thank you for looking at our app, it has been voted one of the top 10 VR apps.

Its hands free, designed for the iphone 6 in conjunction with any modern Smartphone VR Viewer. You control the experience just by looking at things, its hands free for instance look at an Orb to select it.

Travel the world, stand on Mars, experience the magic of King Arthur's Glastonbury Tor, get married, visit the Salt Flats, experience New Year’s Fireworks on Hong Kong Harbour or chill looking at the Northern Lights.  Many more delights await.

Relax, Enjoy, Share and Review.

Instructions

1.   Use WiFi
2.   Install
3.   Wait for the data download to complete
4.   Run the app
5.   Crank up the sound or use headphones
6.   Relax you have time to insert your phone into your case
7.   Look at a Photo Sphere to choose
8.   Look down to exit
9.   When in a Photo Sphere you can zoom by moving your ear to your right shoulder
      zoom out by moving your ear to your left shoulder
10. Relax and enjoy

If you have any Smartphone VR Viewer you will enjoy this experience.  Crank up the sound or use those headphones!

HOW TO PLAY THIS GAME?
- Accelerate your motorcycle by moving your head up

- You can slow down your motor by moving your head down

TO EARN POINTS:

PLEASE NOTE: This app requires a VR Real Feel Motocross handlebar and Bluetooth must be turned on. To find out more, please visit our website: https://www.vr-entertain.com.

With VR Real Feel Motocross, you'll be racing against other bike riders through stunts and jumps and twists and turns!  Different courses to race, including mindoor, outdoor, and even road courses! Level up and unlock new bikes with different performance characteristics, new track levels as you move up in the race campaign! Works with your iPhone 5 up to 7s or iPod Touch 6 for 3D HD graphics. VR headset also works with hundreds of other free VR games available for download!

-  VR Motocross comes with everything you need to start racing -VR headset, and a Bluetooth handlebar for ultimate control!

-  Use your Bluetooth handlebars to race and unlock different motorcycles,
and different tracks.

-  The Max Force Feedback in the handlebars lets you feel every bump and
jump or when you crash into other bikes or obstacles for even more realism.

-  Our VR headset has a comfortable foam face, adjustable straps, and an adjustable phone cradle that will hold up to an iPhone 7 Plus. Additionally, you can use our headset with your iPhone with hundreds of other free VR apps available in the App Store.

-  Easy setup - download the free app from the App Store. Put 3 AAA batteries (not included) into the handlebar. Turn on Bluetooth on your phone, and place your iPhone in the headset & race!

HOW TO PLAY

- Turn on your handlebars, launch the VR Real Feel Motorcycle App; press the Scan button to connect.

For Best Performance:
• Turn off other active apps on your iPhone.
• Ensure Bluetooth is turned on.
• Adjust the harness of the headset to fit your head
• Keep your handlebars upright and play through the tutorial level to learn how to play.
• After playing for 20 minutes, take a 5-minute break to avoid any feelings of dizziness.

If you have any questions or suggestions, we would love to hear from you!

Contact us at any time at http://www.vr-entertain.com/support.html.

VR Mountain Rollercoaster:
VR Mountain RollerCoaster is a relaxing VR ride in wild mountains. Explore the forest and enjoy the lakes in virtual reality. Birds flying around and singing will make this VR relaxing ride even better.

Your astral body allows you to navigate freely in the “Koraikan” as you wish without anyone noticing you.
Enjoy this new dimensional-experience as if you are actually there!!

A children's figures textbook with an augmented reality. With the help of this program you will be able to teach the child to count both in your native language and in English. An interactive “Children’s interesting book with a virtual teacher” will help to make the process of learning to be like a game. Just print the pages of a book with the assignments and together with your child you will immerse in the gameplay in the real and virtual worlds at the same time. In the real world, the child performs logical tasks, does account training, writes numbers in the copybook, learns how to draw lines and figures, the names of parts of the body and animals, and colors the animals. Then he points the tablet or a smartphone at the page of the manual textbook with the exercise completed - and a virtual teacher, a cartoon character Danik appears on the screen of the device. He can talk, explain the tasks, teach your child to correctly pronounce English words and animate painted animals, tell a lot about them, and, what is most important, he can check if the exercises are correct.
A children’s interesting book is selected in such a way as to teach your child basic English words, teach them to count, and comprises such training blocks in the manual textbook: "Interesting Mathematics", "Learn the Numbers", "Learn the Colors".
In order to get stable results and raise your child's interest in the learning process we incorporated a logical game "Interesting Mathematics" in the program.
Bonus for all customers - "Charge Your Eyes."
For more information see our website: http://www.kidsdan.com
New methods of teaching through playing are available today.

Features:
- Children's textbook of figures (for children of 3 to 7 y.o.)
- Exclusive method of teaching “Family Club "MOM” with the augmented reality.
- Virtual playing area "Africa", where your child can travel, get acquainted with different animals and learn a lot of interesting things about them.
- Interactive book with developing tasks. 
- Training for children. 
- Lesson 1: "Learn the numbers from 1 to 10. Includes the words and a virtual teacher."
- Lesson 2: "Learning the figures (preparing for school). Includes the words and a virtual teacher. "
- Lesson 3: "Learn the colors in Russian and English".
- Lesson 4: "Learn the days of the week in Russian and English".
- Lesson 5: "Learn parts of the body in Russian and English".
- Voiceover made by professional actors in their native language and by native English speakers (British School).
- Music design: two children's songs "Count from one to ten", "Days of the week" in English.
- The app supports such languages: Russian, Ukrainian, French, Polish, Spanish, Kazakh, German, American English.
- The training material can be used for children of different ages.
- The electronic version of the book can be downloaded and printed for free.

Join the groups "Books from the" Virtual Teacher Danik "series:

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWC7Gn35yc4BtoAgUnv5diA

Experience a virtual reality tour aboard Scripps Institution of Oceanography’s newest research vessel, R/V Sally Ride. This app takes viewers on an interactive tour of the exterior of the ship, from the working deck just a few feet above the surface of the ocean all the way to the mast more than 70 feet up. See what it’s like to live and work aboard one of the world’s most capable oceanographic research vessels as a crew member or scientist. Check out state-of-the-art equipment used to deploy and recover scientific instrumentation used to study the ocean. On the back deck is the ship’s A-frame, which can handle a 30,000-pound load. Make your way to the upper decks to see the winches and cranes as they stand ready to lower research gear over the side of the ship. Each winch has 10,000 meters of wire spooled onto it, and the crane can lift more than 10,000 pounds, even in rolling seas.

View this app using any phone with a gyro sensor, or for the full experience view using Google Cardboard or a similar virtual reality viewer that is equipped with an input screen trigger.

Operated by Scripps Institution of Oceanography at UC San Diego, R/V Sally Ride is part of the United States academic research fleet. The ship is 238 feet long, weighs 3,034 gross tons, carries 45 people (25 scientists and 20 mariners), and has an endurance of 40 days at sea over a range of 10,545 nautical miles. As a general-purpose research vessel, the ship is configurable to support all oceanographic disciplines including geology, geophysics, physical oceanography, biology, acoustics, chemistry, atmospheric physics and much more. As an Ocean Class ship, Sally Ride serves throughout the Pacific Ocean, from the polar ice margins to the steamy tropics.

More information about R/V Sally Ride and the amazing scientists who sail on board is available online:
scripps.ucsd.edu/ships/sally-ride

We realized optimal simple operation in VR smartphone game.
The spacecraft will tilt when you tilt your own head.
You can move forward while avoiding the looming obstacles.

Tilt your head to the left = Dodge to the left

Tilt your head to the right = Dodge to the right

You can continue the game three times.

At first you can start the game at a slow speed.
After that, it will automatically accelerated.

If when you crash, after 3 seconds, you can automatically re-start.

In VR StarElude 2, you can play VR mode and normal mode.
Let's get the points and proceed to the new stage while exchanging obstacle obstacles.
Newly, it corresponds to Vroom controller.

■ Operation Manual
【basic operation】
(No controller)
- Shake your neck left and right (Tilt left and right): The main character tilts and moves in that direction.
(With controller)
- Tilt the stick of the controller left and right: The main character tilts and moves in that direction.

【Game Contents】
- Increase distance while avoiding obstacles. (The distance is displayed on the screen)
- Get the bonus icon on the field and increase the score.
- The final score is determined by distance and acquisition bonus.
- You will be able to change the aircraft using points you earn.
- Each aircraft has its own characteristics.
- The stage will be updated from time to time.

【VR MODE】
- When checked, the game will start in VR mode. (If you uncheck it, the game will start in normal mode.)
- In VR mode, please set the smartphone on the head mounted display and start.
- Move the line of sight and play the game by overlaying the arrow icon on the OK button for 2 seconds.

【CONTROLLER】
- When checked, you can operate the aircraft with the controller.
- Operate the controller, overlay the arrow icon on the OK button and press the trigger button to start the game.
* Dedicated controller (Vroom controller) must be prepared separately.
http://www.elecom.co.jp/news/201710/jc-vrr02vbk/index.html

【STORE】
- You can change to a new aircraft by using the points earned as the game progresses.
  - OWNED = Currently owned fuselage
  - ACTIVE = Aircraft currently selected
  - Credit Count = the scaling factor of points to be acquired according to the travel distance
  - Speed ​​= Speed ​​of the airframe
  - Cost = Number of points required for airframe purchase

You have to be fast as light as your opponent army is going to try every tactics to knock you out from the race. Show your anger use the chain and sticks and built in guns to kill and eliminate your rivals from the race and become the champion. With every win you will earn some money and rewards. Spend your money wisely to upgrade the bike as the competition is going to be harder and harder. Unlock different bikes and racing highways. This is the war zone. Tribute should be yours.

 You are xracer driver and drive as fast as you can.First of all you have to collect five spaceship powerups which are held in the rings.You must control your xracer and drive with special skills to collect these powerups.

Сбейте зомби в пост-апокалиптическом городе, чтобы выжить в этой игре VR. Есть много зомби, чтобы атаковать и съесть вас. Вы должны быть быстрыми, чтобы направить их на разные уровни. Используйте медицинскую помощь, чтобы увеличить ваше здоровье.

В игре очень темная, творческая графика и тревожные музыкальные треки, чтобы почувствовать атмосферу зомби-ужаса в виртуальной реальности.

Как играть:
- Просто прицелитесь в приближающихся зомби, и ваше оружие автоматически выстрелит.
- Возьмите редко появляющиеся коробки медицинской помощи.
Чем больше вы стреляете, тем быстрее на вас нападают зомби.

Основные возможности:
- 8 уровней, чтобы обладать с более чем 20 типами моделей зомби.
- 5 различных музыкальных треков, которые случайным образом воспроизводятся на уровнях.
- Возможность удалить рекламу и разблокировать все уровни при покупке в приложении.

Оставьте свои комментарии, чтобы сообщить нам, как мы можем улучшить игру. Ваши идеи очень важны для нас, чтобы выпускать лучшие игры VR.

This is a VR Real-Time Simulation Game of the one-on-one fight of the Ultimate Huge Battleships; IOWA-class and Yamato-class.


1: Game Content General

There are only two battleships and enemy battleships in the battle area in the VR space. 
 Please sink the enemy battleship using the main gun during the battle time.


2: Two VR-Battle mode

There are two VR-Battle Modes; “TEST BATTLE” and “PRO BATTLE”.

The function of VR is expected to differ depending on the situation of your device, VR adapter, etc. Therefore, we recommend you to try battleship operation and main gun operation in "VR test battle mode" which you can enjoy for free first. In other words, it is to be familiar with a series of tasks such as quickly finding an enemy battleship, issuing a VR menu, matching main gun sights and shooting.

① VR TEST BATTLE MODE:

You can fight without a BATTLE COIN. Battle conditions are as follows.

  · Number of shells: 12 shells
  · Simultaneous shooting number: 
        3 simultaneous firing (maximum of one turret x 3)
  · Battle time: 180 seconds


② VR PRO BATTLE MODE:

1 BATTLE COIN is required per 1 “VR PRO BATTLE". Battle conditions are as follows.

  · Number of shells: 150 shells
  · Simultaneous shooting number:  “ALL-SALVO” !! 
       9 simultaneous launches (maximum 3 guns each 3 turret)
  · Battle time: 600 seconds

BATTLE COIN can be purchased as in-app items.


3: VR Battle Operation

Please refer to the description of the operation explanation.

Usually the VR battleship operation menu is not displayed.
VR Battleship Operation Menu appears by tilting the head sideways.

The function begins to move by matching the VR cursor at the center of the line of sight to the spherical operation switch on the menu.
You can check whether the operation has been performed by changing the color of the operation switch or sound.

In the VR test battle, we recommend that you train battleship navigation and gun control and launch.

When stopping the operation switch, it takes a while for the operation to actually stop after turning it off. In the case of a main gun sight towards an enemy battleship, it is necessary to understand this characteristic well before turning it off a little earlier. With this in mind, we recommend that you practice main gun sighting quickly and practice to hit enemy battleship with main gun’s shells.


The VR battleship operation menu is basically the same as the free iOS application “BATTLE OF BATTLESHIP". Tutorial on battleship operation is also prepared for this application, so please refer as necessary.


4: Simulation Summary

Simulation is realized basically under the same condition as the free application "Battleship fighting space".
The outline is shown below.


 [1] The Physical Law Modification:

 To realize the short-time and amazing spectacle battle of huge battleships, some of the physical 
 laws in this Real-Time Simulation World are carefully modified.

 [2] Consideration of Battleship Performances:

  Although there are many evaluations, the following major performances are being
  considered in this simulation.

     ========================================================
                                                       IOWA class                    YAMATO class
 ========================================================
      Main Gun:  Firing-Range:               good                             excellent
      Main Gun:  Rate of Fire:              excellent                             good
      Speed & Maneuverability:           excellent                             good
 ========================================================


5: Conclusion:

 We believe that the amazing spectacle VR battle of the huge battleship is established by the
 unique modification of the physical laws in this application.
 Please enjoy this VR real-time simulation of battle of battleship.

                                                                                 Null City Realtime Simulations;

column1: VR: Mermaid Adventure In Virtual Reality
column6:
This game is an amazing Virtual Reality game.in this game you have get a great experience of virtual reality.

Your task is attack and save your self, so try it now and enjoy a lot.

VRaccoon is a first-person arcade game – where you become a raccoon, roaming the flat in search of treats. Your job is to collect pieces of food that are in the air along your way. The game uses interesting navigation: you need to push the ball of wool for flying from room to room. Under the sweets you can find hidden bonuses. The biggest fun is to move with the raccoon-style fore, tapping the touch pad. This game is a perfect choice for all family – it is naïve, but bright and exciting.

•THIS GAME REQUIRES VR HEADSET•

FEATURES:
• Fully immersive VR experience
• Innovative and intuitive player controller
• Simple and user friendly gameplay

COMPATIBILITY
• VRaccoon supports all mobile VR headsets (Google Cardboard, Homido, Fibrum, etc.)
• The game is compatible with the most of HID USB/Bluetooth gamepads.

GAME OPTIONS:
• You can play the game without VR headset. Turn off «VR Mode» in the menu
• In case of performance issue you can turn off "Distortion Correction” in the menu

Have any ideas how to improve the game?

E-mail: welcome@greatgonzo.ru
Get updates on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/greatgonzostudio/
Check out the website at: http://greatgonzo.ru

column1: Vrais appels et sons pour chasse à l’orignal - (Annonce gratuit) COMPATIBLE AVEC BLUETOOTH
column6:
Vous voulez de vrais appels et sons pour la chasse à l’orignal ?  L’application « Vrais appels et sons pour chasse à l’orignal » vous offre des appels d’orignal à portée de main. Les sons sont clairs, limpides, réalistes et ont été enregistrés à partir de vrais orignaux. Inclus 7 bandes sonores d’orignaux uniques. Vous ne trouverez pas de meilleure application pour la chasse à l’orignal ! Il suffit de connecter l'application à tout haut-parleur Bluetooth et vous avez un système électronique d’appel d’orignal instantané.


FONCTIONNALITÉS :
- 7 bandes sonores d’orignal
-  Sons réalistes, efficaces et clairs pour attirer les orignaux
-  Compatible avec Bluetooth pour synchroniser avec un haut-parleur sur le terrain  
-  Les sons peuvent jouer en arrière-plan de votre téléphone vous permettant ainsi d’envoyer des messages texte, de prendre des photos et de naviguer sur Internet sans perturber les appels d’orignal
 -  Les longs enregistrements vous permettent de mettre l’appel en marche et de vous concentrer sur la chasse.
-  Connectez-vous à votre système d’haut-parleurs avec des câbles audio ou Bluetooth (câbles non inclus)
-  Plus besoin de penser à apporter votre lecteur MP3 ou vos cartes mémoires : vous avez toujours votre téléphone avec vous !
  -  Audio pour la chasse à l’orignal pour une fraction du coût d'achat de plusieurs bandes sonores ou de cartes mémoire 


Bandes sonores incluses dans « Vrais appels et sons pour chasse à l’orignal »
-  Combat d’orignaux 
-  Grognement
-  Grognement du mâle
-  Femelle 
-  Le « Ooh Wah » 
-  Frottements 1 
-  Frottements 2 

Téléchargez « Vrais appels et sons pour chasse à l’orignal » et profitez d’une chasse fructueuse dès aujourd’hui !


      more

Met de verschillende digitale kaartensets heb je altijd genoeg gespreksstof. Of je nou met vrienden, je geliefde of je familie bent.

Volgens wetenschapper Sherry Turkle worden gesprekken oppervlakkiger zodra er een smartphone op tafel ligt. Met Vrank niet. Kies je kaartenset, stel elkaar de vraag en swipe naar de volgende. Door alle vragen heen? Probeer een van de andere sets of open dezelfde set opnieuw en de kaarten zijn weer geschud. Het enige dat je hoeft te doen, is aandachtig luisteren en eerlijk antwoorden. Wees vrank.

+ Altijd gespreksstof bij de hand
+ Voor (bijna) elke situatie een kaartenset
+ Deel een kaart en #durftevragen
+ Ook voor in het donker (werkt met Dark Mode)

Met deze kaartensets kun je zo aan de slag:
• Ouderwets belletje (met je opa en oma)
• Bij bier of 'n wijntje (met je vrienden)
• Date Night (met je partner)
• Filosofische bui (met andere doordenkers)


VOLLEDIGE VERSIE
Smaakt het naar meer? Met de volledige versie kun je alle sets gebruiken:
• First Date (tijdens de eerste ontmoeting)
• Na het eten (met de familie)
• Twaalfuurtje (met je collega's)
• Na de schoolbel (met je kids)
• Levensvragen (met andere doordenkers)
• Bakkie met m'n ouders
• Sollicitatie-proof
• Er komen steeds meer sets bij

Omdat we de app continu willen verbeteren, vragen we voor de volledige versie een steuntje in de rug.

WAT BETEKENT VRANK?
Vrank heeft in het Nederlands meerdere betekenissen: open, oprecht, spraakzaam en vrijmoedig. Dat is precies wat we hopen dat mensen ervaren tijdens het gebruik van de app. En natuurlijk mag er ook gelachen worden.


      more

Experience the glory of 1970's vector graphics in this elegant and minimalistic interpretation of the classic break-out game. Simple, yet challenging, this essential game brings multiple levels, power-ups, and endless entertainment in a small package.

Vector graphic games experienced their peak in the late 1970s and into the next decade. The improved video capabilities and affordability of personal computers in the early 1980s quickly made them irrelevant. 

VRECTOR is a tribute to a long gone and mostly forgotten video game art style. Please enjoy.


      more

First you can choose from 2 to 4 players and select a username for each one. Then you are given a category and a letter, and from that you must think of a word. Whoever presses the buzzer faster, says what he/she thought. If the other players agree with the word, you get the point. Whoever has the most points until the end of the game wins.

This 3D VR demo experience from BrickSimple LLC allows you to free climb a wall using just your Google Cardboard device. Use the indexer or tap the screen to select potential grip points as you ascend nearly 50m up the face of the wall. Sure grips are a sure thing, but if you see the hand showing a little nervous twitch, you're at risk for a fall -- that's part of the fun! It's a pain free rock climbing gym. Never the same wall twice -- a unique climbing wall every time.
Be sure to visit http://brickvr.com for updates on our VR work. Thank you for your support!

Note: For the best experience, this virtual reality application should be used with a standard indexer-equipped virtual reality viewer like Google Cardboard or the Mattel Viewmaster VR. If your viewer doesn't have a button, you can tap the screen. Enjoy!

Throw down a challenge to all the 80s and 90s gamers. Get back the enthusiasm you had once!

Control the dragon and the vajras, and destroy the evil Dragon Emperor "VRITRA"!
Awesome graphics, powerful sound effects and amazing controls.
This ultimate 2D shooter is a step forward in the history of the shooting games!



-----STORY--------------------------------------------------------

100 years ago the world was a peaceful place and people lived together in peace.
However a black dragon arrived followed its folks with evil thoughts and built their nation.
The dragon called itself Dragon Emperor and ruled the whole world spreading fear, massacring and looting.

The long-suffering inhabitants prayed to be saved, as they believed their old legend: 

"when the black dragon will fade in the dark, the blue dragon will shine a light on the world again."



-----ABOUT THE GAME--------------------------------------------------------

- This is a 2D side scrolling shooter. Control the dragon and the vajras to destroy the enemy!

- Use the single boost button only. Keep pressing to blow up the enemies!

- There are 4 kinds of vajras. Take advantage of characteristics of each vajra:
　- Blue vajra... Concentrated front attack
　- Green vajra... Defense
　- Yellow vajra... Wide range attack
　- Red vajra... Technical all directions attack

- Each vajra has a different boost behavior! Mastering how to handle the vajra is the key to rule the game!

- You can multiply your score by damaging or destroying the enemy with boost! Build up more multiplier and aim at a high score! 

- Support replay function! Download the other users' replay data and learn how they completed the game!

- Support GAME CENTER! Break the record and compete against rivals to get the highest score!



-----SUPPORT DEVICE--------------------------------------------------------

- iPhone 4S or later
- iPad 2 or later



-----SUPPORT--------------------------------------------------------

- Support site 
http://vritra.neotro.jp/ 

- Company site (Neotro Inc.) 
http://neotro.jp/

VRkanoid is our interpretation of the old classic arcade game Arkanoid but in VR (virtual reality). We invite you to try out our virtual creation and leave your comments bellow. Only with feedback from VR gamers we can push the game to the next level. We will update the game and the virtual reality experience by implementing the best of your suggestions and addressing all of your concerns.
The game starts on an endless plane of liquid with perfect reflection properties. It looks like a sea of metal, floating in space. You will want to turn your head to see the full potential of virtual reality (VR). It is an amazing experience when done right. You can press the start button by looking at it. After continuing you will confront your first level of Arkanoid in virtual reality. It is made in 2.5 dimensions as this is the optimal position for mobile VR as it doesn’t cause any motion sickness. Destroy all the bricks by keeping the ball in play. You control the paddle by turning your head left and right. Focus and finish all the levels of this virtual reality game. 
At the moment it is only a proof of concept with five levels, but you get the general idea of this VR game. It was designed with Google Cardboard in mind, but you shouldn’t have any problems playing it on other mobile VR HMDs. We already got some great feedback about how to make the VR experience even better, but we want to ask you to do the same – tell us what you think so we can make this the best virtual reality game out there.

Enjoy!

** VR + Arkanoid = VRkanoid **

Vrmazing lets you draw your own 3D maze with obstacles on a real piece of paper. After scanning the paper with your phone you will be able to play it in real glorious 3D! If your phone is able to be used with Virtual Reality headsets you can even switch to the VR view to experience your game in VR!

Visit http://www.vrmazing.eu/colorcards and print the image on a piece of paper. Color the squares with the color indicated and draw your maze inside the big square. The goal of your game will be to get from start to finish in the shortest amount of time possible. You can draw lava as an obstacle and a hoverboard to cross this obstacle. The hoverboard only works for a limited time though!

When you are done drawing your game , you can use the app to scan it. Make sure your paper is within the indicated area and wait for the scan finish. Press play to experience it!

When playing you can press the screen to move forward. Press the VR logo in the bottom right to switch to VR mode ( only on supported devices ). Once in VR mode you can press the top left cross to go back to window mode. The top-right arrow can be pressed to go back to the main menu. Note that switching to VR mode must be done with the phone held upright. You can walk when inside VR mode by walking on the spot.

The Ideeenlab is a small company where teams of self employed professionals are working on ideas related to Virtual Reality, Augmented Reality and Internet of Things. VRmazing is the first app to be released to the world.


      more

Think quickly and create smart moves to escape from your enemies. Challenge yourself to invade your enemies' spaceship, avoid traps that are inside them, and be careful because there are a lot! and get the energy inside the spaceships. To be successful you'll need to have fast reflexes, agility, strategy and intelligence to accomplish your missions that every time they get harder and harder.

You’ll be the nicest cyborg frog of the whole galaxy, you will seek for energy for your spaceship that is called Girino. The energy needed is inside your enemies’ spaceship that are full of traps and also the enemies that will defend their energy, because nowadays the energy is rare. Help the frog in his mission, be careful because enemies will appear, and the traps need to be avoided… think quickly, create your strategy and get in to the portal before the enemies get you!

In the game:
Invade 6 different spaceships and steal their energy
Use the offered shield for additional protection in the level
Remove ads and get all the advantages that it offers you: one more life and a shield in each level.

column1: Vroom! Cars and Trucks for Kids
column6:
Colorful app for 1 to 3 year old kids that love cars and trucks. Discover various animal drivers in each car, help a garbage truck pick up all the trash or lift a heavy box with a crane. Explore police car, garbage truck, mixer truck, fire engine, ambulance, crane, digger and dump truck.

Children can tap what they see in the app and switch on the headlights, put out a fire or find out who is inside the ambulance. The app help kids improve their eye-hand coordination and it teaches them about cars and their parts.

User interface is tailored for toddlers and preschoolers, so that they can use the app on their own. Three cars are offered for free, others are available as an in-app purchase.

There are no ads in the app.


      more

360 VR Car Racing Game | VRoom2™ - Car Racing Redefined 

Choose from over 6M car combinations and build the perfect one for your race! 

Customize your car wheels with peppermint candies, body of your car with carrot, donut, or an empty bottle, decorate your customized car with accessories like bunny ears; the options are unlimited. Remember, every customized part will make an impact to the performance and driving of your car - Choose the one that is right for you.

VRoom2 is a new 360 VR Racing Game that will redefine the car racing altogether.  VRoom2 can be played online and offline; you can host a race and invite your friends to compete, or play an individual/solo race against the computer. 

There are three racing tracks available for now (with three laps in every track) and the next few tracks would be downloaded with the next update (expected early next month). 

Car Racing over the weekend, among all your family members, and among your classmates (during the lunch break) isn’t a bad idea to test and develop your VRoom2 car racing skills.
 
It’s fun, it’s entertaining, it’s challenging, and it’s car racing at its best!
 
Download today and invite your friends to race. 
 
Note: The multiplayer/online mode is in production stages and expected to be released by early next month.

Share your feedback by visiting www.vroom2.com or by sending us an email at info@w5go.com.
 
Like us on Facebook @VRoom2 
Follow us on Twitter @OfficialVRoom2

You're Vroomba, an AI vacuum.  As Vroomba goes about cleaning up, it sees humans and cats and helps them solve their problems and puzzles.

Vroom-vroom, it’s time to set off! Have fun with a new bright game for restless riders.

Vroomer opens you the world of funny riders and bright locations. Gramma, Scoot, Lizza, Bibear and many others all launch out on their hilarious bikes and scooters. Still, going up the hills is not an easy challenge - will you accept it? It’s not just about the speeding; it’s about going as far as possible without breaking bones. Try it: who knows, maybe you are a champion of this race.

Choose a bright character and a beautiful location. Move on and earn coins to get more from the game. And do your best not to kill your characters too often!

Features:
A gallery of lovely characters 
Variety of locations for a ride
Stylish graphics and cool physics simulation
Good looks on various devices and resolutions
Simple and clear interface


Vroomer is free to play but there are optional in-app purchases available.
Don’t hesitate to share your feedback so that we would know how to make Vroomer better for you. Off we go!

VRS Fight Club is a completely free, fun and exciting game for the whole family. In the game MG is a kid in a quest to save the world. Help him collect points as he travels around the world.The aim of the game is to avoid getting damaged, pass through the obstacles, while collecting as many points as possible. MG runs across various global cities – including London, New York, Beijing, and Rio de Janeiro.The game is designed for all age groups and aims to help educate people but in a fun and engaging way.VRS Fight Club is available in 10 languages: - English - Portuguese - Chinese - Arabic - Italian - Japanese - French - Spanish - German - RussianCheck more info:www.magikbee.comTERMS OF USE  - http://magikbee.com/terms-of-usePRIVACY POLICY  - http://magikbee.com/privacy-policy.

VR compatible! The app allows you to enter the world of "Re:ZERO - Starting Life in Another World."
 ※This app is a one-time purchase. No in-game purchases are required to enjoy the game in full.
 
 -Play Modes
 *"Lying together" mode: Emilia lies down next to you as she gently eases you into sleep.
 *"View" mode: Enjoy a 360-degree view of Emilia's 1:1 scale VR model from any angle you desire. Includes 3+1 scenes in total.
 
 ***The Four Top Highlights of the Game***
 (1) Because the app is VR compatible, playing with a VR headset on makes you feel like Rem is really lying next to you!
 ※The game can still be played without a VR headset.
 ※Check the official Re:ZERO VR website for recommended VR headsets.
 (2) Total of 24 scenarios features not only famous lines from the series, but birthdays and other events!
 (3) All-new recordings by Emilia's voice actress, Rie Takahashi!
 (4) Equipped with thumb control technology to allow motion controls even with smartphone VR!
 Gugenka's original control technology, operated by touching the smartphone screen with both thumbs, expresses such motions as teleporting, peeking in, and kneeling, just as they would appear on high-end VR devices.
 
 ***News***
 A "lap pillow version" in which the player's head rests on Emilia's lap is also available!
 The "lap pillow" and "view" modes are designed to "lap pillow version" specs.
 ※The "lap pillow version" uses the same voice recordings.
 
 -Hardware Requirements
 iOS 9.0 or newer
 
 -Guaranteed Smoothest VR Experience
 iPhone 7, iPhone 7 Plus, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6s Plus, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus
 
 -Confirmed Compatible Devices
 iPhone 5s, iPhone SE
 ※Please note that these models have been known to show some stuttering that may cause discomfort or motion sickness.

column6:

「VRダンジョン」遂にリリース！

見習い勇者となって、ハコスコ装備で冒険に出かけよう！
360°目線でダンジョンを冒険してモンスターを倒せ！
最下層にいるドラゴンを倒して勇者の証を手に入れろ！

リアルな大阪3D都市モデルで鬼ごっこ！！
リアルな大阪の街を舞台にした、完全無料のランニングアクションゲームです。

——————————————
■主役はSDクエリちゃん
ブラック・クエリちゃんと鬼ごっこだよ。
たこ焼きを避けながら、スピードアップして、ブラッククエリちゃんを追いかけよう！

■捕まえたら、攻守交代
ブラック・クエリちゃんを捕まえたら今度は逃げるよ。
たこ焼きを避けながら、ゴールを目指そう！

■かんたん操作で、爽快アクション。
左右のタップ操作だけの超簡単操作だよ。

■VRモード搭載
VRモードをONにすると、Google CardBoardを用いてVRプレイ出来るよ。
（ジャイロセンサでの操作）
　　- 左右に傾ける： 左右移動
　　- 水平 -> 上 -> 下 -> 水平 に傾ける：　ゲームスタート、タイトルへ戻る（ゲームオーバー時）

——————————————
本ゲームは株式会社ゼンリンの提供する『ZENRIN シティアセットシリーズ』第2弾の『Japanese Naniwa　City』を用いたプロモーションゲームです。

１）小さいけど確実にダメージを与えられるショット。
２）長いチャージ時間というリスクを背負って大ダメージが狙えるチャージショット。
３）敵の攻撃を防げるバリア。

プレイヤーは3つのアクションを使いこなし全ステージのクリアを目指します。

まさかのホッケーと色塗りがコラボレーション？！！

ホッケーを土台とした新感覚の対戦ゲーム！

一台のスマホでマルチプレイが可能！

シンプルで直感的な操作ができるので、ゲームが苦手な人でも楽しめます！

塗って塗って塗りつぶせ！

The only aim is maximizing your score by merging the cards from smallest to biggest one! 
Gain extra bonus point with making combos. Double, triple merge your cards to gain extra bonus points.
And in the game, you may meet "Undo" Card, "WILD" Card and "Bomb" Card. The "Undo" Card can increase one chance for revocation, the "WILD" Card can combine with any cards and the "Bomb" Card can eliminate a whole column.

The more you play, the more scores you will get.
Although it looks simple,you may have to work hard in order to get higher score. 

Game Features: 
Free Free Free
Endless mode
Easy control
show off your record to your friends


      more

What do you do if you encounter a tailgating car which reduces the distance between cars?
Want to throw bananas and repulse it? ?
The game that you repulse the tailgating car by fruits is finally here! !

Repel cars by fruits (bananas, apples, pineapples) that tailgating you, throwing empty cans and flickering lights!
Collect coins and collections that you can clear and get!
Sometimes, level up the fruit with that coin! Level up to the maximum and break through the limits ...


------------------------------------------------------


・You can play the game by selecting "Play" and selecting any stage.
・ Once the game starts, the orange car will come up in various ways, so let's dodge it and repel with fruits.
・ The green gauge at the top right of the game screen is your frustration gauge. When this reaches zero, the game is over.
・ The blue gauge at the top left of the game screen is the frustrating gauge of the tailgating car. This is reduced by hitting the fruit. The game is clear when it reaches zero.
・ If you clear the game, you will get coins and collections.
・ Coins are used to level up fruits on the "Level Up" screen.
・ Upgrading the fruit will cause more damage to the car driving.
・ If you do not have enough coins, you can also earn coins by watching a video advertisement for a few seconds on the “AD” screen.
・ Ads cannot be viewed continuously and can be viewed again up to 3 hours later.
・ There are a total of 15 collections.
・ There is no actual cost..


-----------------------------------------------------


＜Attention＞
Although this game is a game in which the theme is "tailgating car", do not imitate a tailgating car that appears in the game on actual public roads. Tailgating car is a malicious and dangerous car that can lead to serious accidents. If you see a tailgating car, go to a safe place and call police immediately. Drive recorders are also useful for both deterrence and recording. It is also important not to be mistaken for being a perpetrator on tailgating. When another car breaks in, you may be frustrated for a moment. But you have to be patient. Traffic safety is achieved through the caring of each and every driver. It is a smart driver who does not become a victim or assailant of tailgating, driving caring following traffic rules. Also, the user shall be responsible for any losses that may occur through playing the game.


      more

A great chance to develop super-new submarines and explore the mysterious underwater world!As we all know, 70% of the earth is covered by the ocean and it’s always an important target for scientists to investigate the underwater creatures and explore more resources. So now, you’re one of the scientists! What you need to do is to invent newer and more powerful submarines and control them for underwater exploration.Many underwater creatures floating around to attack your submarine. You have to manipulate your machine to dodge the offense of them and at the same time, counterattack them. Don't be fooled by their cute shape, they are not innocent.Gameplay:-	Combine submarines of the same class to obtain a higher level submarine;-	Dispatch submarines into the water to explore and defeat all enemies encountered;Features:- Develop various submarines;- Extremely easy operation;- Great level design with reasonable difficulty;- Full of cute but pesterous octopus.Don’t wait any longer! Just come and get more powerful submarines to explore the unknown underwater world!
